instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Changes in Felixstone in the UK between 1967 and 2001 <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'The maps illustrate the changes in the Felix Stone area over a 34-year period, from 1980 to 2005. 

It can be seen on the map that Felix Stone witnessed a striking transformation. Most noticeably, the elimination of the farmland. 

Looking at the picture in detail, one can see that the farmland in the northeastern corner was turned into a large entertainment complex with a swimming pool, a hotel, and two tennis courts. The fish market, the marine, and the pier system were completely demolished to make way for a private beach. 

Turning to the southwest of the map, many wind turbines were erected facing the sea. Besides, the cafe in the centre of the beach was still in the same place, while a new parking lot was added next to the hotel to better cater to the accommodation needs of visitors. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> You are working for a company. You need to take some time off work and want to adk your manager about this. <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'Dear Sir or Madam,

I am writing this letter to ask permission for 10 days. Because I am going to travel to Dubai with my family for celebrating my mother's birthday.

My mother always dreamed of travelling and celebrating her birthday in Dubai. Our family knew about that, therefore we planned to travel to Dubai for few months. My mother was thrilled after hearing this news.

My mother's birthday is on 10th June. We are going to fly on 9th June and travel untill 20th June. Therefore I want to take time off from work for 10days. Because, we are planning to celebrate birthday in Burj khalifa, then we are going to visit to another well-known places in Dubai within 10 days.

While I planning the travel I also thought about my work. I asked  my colleague Phoebe about taking over my work's responsibility for 10 days and  she does not mind it. So I want to tell you  that if I take time off work , Phoebe will take over my work for me temporarily.

I look forward your answer soon

Yours faithfully

Marjona. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> In the future, nobody will buy printed newspapers or books because they will be able to read everything they want online without paying.

To what extent do you agree or disagree with this statement? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'There is no denying the fact that online huge concept. While it is a commonly held belief that no one will pay newspapers or novels due to reading everything from online website, there is also an argument that opposes it. In my opinion, I consider that all shopping sites from Google,Yahoo etc. is popular in our community. To begin with, reading in online is an essential part in our society. In other words, reading from websites in general is famous and applied by all people around the world. In addition, online shopping without paying is great importance in our lives and no one can avoid it because it will help them in difficult times. For example, it is noted that approximately 85 % of people they using the sites to read some free  book and newspapers. Another point to consider,online some time it has more expensive products than shop. It is possible to say that, some tome online website it has 5% tax than normal shop. Moreover, some countries they have governments tax from any free website. For instance, African countries like Somalia, Sudan, Kenya thay have to spending money to the government to debit any tax when they visiting any site from Google. In conclusion, despite people having different views, I believe that free online to read some novels and news is significant thing, and should all people realize its importance, and also reading book without paying will solving all the issues for the human in our world. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Some people say it is important to keep your home and your workplace tidy, with everythin organised and in the correct place. What is your opinion about it? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'Our home is the mirror of our personality. Few people think that it's necessary to keep house and working areas clean and stuffs are organize. I strongly agree on this as home and workingplace are the places we usually occupied.

Home with organized stuffs are appealing to the eyes, easy to move around the areas and immediately find things needed. For example, shoes and clothes have each cabinet, food supplies and other kitchen essentials place on pantry areas, and stuff that not usually used must keep in storage room.  

Futheremore, clean working environment can make us comfortable while working and our mind is at ease. It helps us to be productive as no distruction while working. For instance, we can concentrate for our task and assignment and finish as early with the deadlines, in which we will be able to spend our extra time for other important matter. In addition, staffs portfolio easily to locate if needed as it is organized with designated labels.

To sum up, with proper organization of stuff and tidy environment gives more comfort and peace to individuals as there's no time wasted. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> It is better for students to study from home rather than go to school to you ang agree or disagree with this statement? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'Online class is relevant to students than attending class regularly to school. However, I strongly disagree that children must study from home. 

Students learning in school is much more excited as they have new experience everyday. They will engage with their classmate. Teachers provide some activities that students interact in which their mind exercise to create new ideas. For instance, children have time chatting with friends, make project for specific topics with classmate and a chance to learn some ideas to other peers. 

On the other hand, schools as well is the training ground for students activities. There are extra curricular activities in schools whereas students can able to join and boost their invidual talents. In fact, successful players start to developed their talents when they were students. 

To conlude, studying in schools is more beneficial to children as it offers wide learning not only in terms of academics but as well as their personal, social and talent development. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Explain why you want to take time off work

• Give details of the amount of time you need

• Suggest how your work could be covered while you are away <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'Dear Sir or Madam,

I have been working in this company for several years. Guests from different countries visit this company. Then there will be an offer of joint cooperation from various companies. I have always been in the service. However I never went on vacation. I even work on Saturdays and Sundays. I wanted to rest. Give me two weeks off to rest.

Two weeks is enough time for me. During this time, I will rest comfortably. I will be with my family for a week. I will be traveling for the rest of the week. Thank you for giving me the day off.

My work doesn't stop when I'm gone. Because I will put a worker in my place. That worker, like me, knows every language one hundred percent. He can communicate easily and has a good relationship with every person who visits the company.

Don't worry, this worker won't report his absence. Covers the company well.

Your sincerely

Mokhinur <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> In some places old age is valued, while in other cultures youth is considered more important.Discuss both views and giv your opinion. <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'It is believed that some regions value old people whereas diffrent cultures state that younger generation to be the priority.This author agree that younger people should be prior mor than older people and will demonstrate why throught out this essay.

Specifically, most of the work forces nowadays are young workers.As young people are usually more healthy and active mny cultures throughout the world admire their skills and passion.Therefore,youngsters help to benefit the country they served and build a better living environment.

However, when most youngsters are immature and inexperience, they tend to symbolize as the fragile innocent of the society.Subsequently, wiser elder people in some of the country are look up by many individuals.They give advices and lead the young generatin for a better lifestyle.It is also beleived that the affection elder people got in their retirement is for their dedication and hardwor during their youth.

To sum up, while older people tend to be more experienced and worth the affection more than younger people, is is undeniable that the young generation is also being valued as they are the main work forc of their country. <END_E>

input:

 <START_E> 'In modern digital world, society think that senilities have assessable role more than young age. However, some against that youngsters are the key of future. This author believes that young age are base of the development.

input:

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Some people think that men and women  have different qualities, therefore certain jobs are suitable for men and others for women. To what extent do you agree of disagree? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'Nowadays, many individuals believe that males and famales have distint characters, so men are suitable for certain jobs and others for women. This author totally agree with this statement and will demonstrate the main reason why.

First of all, quality is the most necessary cause which decide the job you have in the future. It can clearly be seen that women tend to be more hard working and carefull than men, therefore they are associated with job that handling statistic and carefulless. In the fact that in almost company, almost all cashiers and accountants are female while male just only do manual or communication-related jobs.

Even so, women still cam do jobs such as workers and men  also can be a sher but depends on your capability when you very good at this job or you have a high degree. However, it just can help you have the job you want and to do that work for a short period of time, if the  manegers knows that you do not fit in with this job because your quality, you will be still dismiss.

Conclusion, quality is one of the most cause which decision your work, but if you have the high degree you still have your dream job. However it still depend on your quality if you want to work for along time. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> In some pleces old age is valued while in other cultures youth is considered more important. Discuss both view and give your opinion, <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'Many places that people treasure old age, whereas other people believe that youth plays a more important role. From my experience, I believe cultural youth is more crucial. This essay discusses both sides of this statement.

To begin, the culture of the youth is very important because of its variety. The teenagers seem to be more creative and suitable to the modern society. Compared with the last 70 years, these days cultures are not only unique, but also more comfortable. A good example of this is that women in the 20th century were not able to wear clothes variously and comfortably, but teenagers in this century have various styles and can express their characteristics via their styles.

On the other hand, old age is highly valued due to their experience. They had undergone and were more strict in any details. However, it is no longer suitable for this digital era, since their cultures are too strict and unacceptable by young people. The best example of this is the difference between the two generations, and old people are not harmonious.

To sum up, I agree that cultural youth is more important because of the new and development of society. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> You are taking a course at a local collage .The deadline for your project was but you havenʼt finished it 

-introduce yourself.

-explain why you havenʼt handed in the project yet.

-request more time to do it. <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'Dear Sir,

The purpose of writing this letter is to apologize for a problem.I will explain this problem now.

I have been attending your local course since last week.My name is Anna .I think,you know me.I was taking to the course at 2oʼclock.It has twenty peopleʼs.If you remember this course,we were working on a project.

You asked us to find a meaningful event in the history of our town.I was supposed to finish this project today but I could not finish this project.There are many reasons for this.For instance,I got sick and I come from the hospital today.

But I searched for this event in a book and could not find it .I found information about it on the internet now, however it will take some time to write .I want to ask you for some time for the project .

So I want to apologize to you ,but If you give men two weeks for this project ,I would definitely finish it.

  Thanks for your time.

Yours faithfully,

Norquvvatova Shahrizoda <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:

 <START_E> 'For me music is so important phenomenon  of my life.  Because  for me music give me the atmosphere of the situations and give motivation to do something.      The second view is international music. I so interested with those  kind of music. International music describe during the period or situation. In this kind of music tell all the normal notion. instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> You are working for a company. You need to take some time off work and want to ask your manager about this. 

Questions: 

1.Explain why you want to take time off work 

2.Give details of the amount of time you need

3.Suggest how your work could be covered while you are away <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'Dear Sir or Madam, 

I am writing to you to enquire about taking some time off my work.

I would be greatful if you could allow me some time off my work. Because, today is my mother's birthday. So I need a lot of duration  to celebrate her birthday. 

First of all, I have to book into restaurant from near the beach. Usually, restaurants always busy in the evening. We are going to try this Italian fish restaurant on the seafront. They do really good food at that place and it is not very expensive either.

Also, I have to buy a mesmerizing dress for my mommy. Because my mom worth it expensive presents. In addition to this, I would like to make party cakes for my queen. 

I suggest if you could give me extra time off my work I will labour out of my work tomorrow. 

I look forward to hearing from you soon. 

Yours sincerely, 

Po‘latova Parizoda. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Some people think that the best way to run a business is within the family, while others find a family-run business unsuccessful. Discuss both opinions and present your own. <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'The operation and ownership of family businesses are prevalent in many countries.  While some individuals perceive this as an ideal method of managing a business, others consider that it has several difficulties. In the essay, we will examine both perspectives and argue that while family ownership has its benefits, it may lead to inherent problems that can hinder sustainable business growth.

Many people hold the view that the strong sense of unity and loyalty are the major advantages of running a family business. Family members working together tend to share a deep bond and commitment to the success of the business. This bond can create a wonderful environment for efficient decision-making and effective communication for the future. For example, some family-run companies has maintained their reputation for decades due to family’s strong dedication to quality and customer satisfaction. Their customer services have earned them a loyal clientele.

On the other hand, it is argued by some that the family-run business is not always successful as there are many disputes. This can create ego related some issues and ruin in the family peace. Some family members especially youngsters are willing to join this trade because they want to earn more money so this will create a detrimental impact on the company.

To conclude, a family-owned business which has commitment and good relationship will improve for a long time. However, the family who tries to run their own business have to keep their bonds before they turn into a business crisis. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Population of Countries of the European Union in 2021 by percentage <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'The pie chart compares the share of population in countries in the European Union in 2021.

Overall, what stands out from the chart is that the population of Germany was responsible for the largest group of humans, whereas the least among seven countries was recorded in Netherlands. 

With regard to the chart, the largest proportions of population were in Germany and France. While the former ranked first with approximately slightly less than 20%, about 3 out of every 20 human beings in Europe live in the latter. As shown in the chart, Italy, Spain, and Poland shared nearly similar proportions and together were host to roughly one-third of populations of the European Union.

Focusing on the rest, population in countries, namely Romania and Netherlands, was almost the same, 3.9% and 4.3%, respectively. The remaining a little more than a quarter of population of the European Union was estimated on other countries. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Universities should accept equal numbers of male and female students in every subject.  

To what extent do you agree or disagree? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'Looking back on the last two generations, our parents receive the education system that is regulated to include both sexes.  The pre-organized mechanism allows both male and female students to understand each other better as well as to create a better environment for the students to come up with a variety of solutions when facing difficulties.  Therefore, I strongly agree that universities ought to accept fair numbers of male and female students in all subjects.

To begin with, university is a place where people learn.  In other words, no one should be excluded or limited to choose what they want to take part in. Also, with equal sexes in classes, students can exchange different ideas from opposite sex that according to a study, it stimulates students to think.

Next to go would be, no one can deny that universities are stepping stones of the fickle society.  If a student who go to a university that only accept males or females, they would not be full fledge to deal with various problems that will be encountered after they graduate.

To sum up, based on the abovementioned, history is the mirror of tomorrow; thus, keep taking in the same amount of male and females students would accelerate students’ learning efficiency. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:

ree with this statement <END_Q>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Space travel to the moon is considered as “a step of mankind.” But some people think that space travel has made little difference to people’s lives today. 

To what extent do you agree or disagree? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'In this modern life huminity have technology which can discover the moon. However, some individuals argue about impact this discovering for earth residents, part of them think it will good influence whereas another part  have different  imagine. In my personal opinion, traveling and discovering moon have very little influence to our live. 

On the one hand, traveling to the space seems new era of technology, however huminity has a lot of earth problem like global warming, air pullution. Thus, new techonology and all effort spending to discover to moon should contribute to solve earth problem. We have a great nature with all things what we need, so people do not need to discover moon to increase live level. People will happy if government pay attention vital problem like air pollution. 

On the other hand, all countries try to be first discovered country of moon, so their spent much money for this field. Instade of this will be better put money for education and medicine system. Life expactancy and well education are impotant for residence than trevalling  to the moon. input:

what do you think about this? <END_Q>

Focusing on the number in tons for the company A and C, there was a continuous decline in the figure for the company A, which declined from the inception of 12 in 2000 to the end of almost 8 in 2015. instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> When choosing a job, the salary is the most important consideration. To what extent do you 

agree or disagree? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'Nowadays, more and more young people are looking for a job and salary is a important consideration.However, there are several factors when we looking for a job .

First of all, interest is a important factor to guarantee our ambition and motivation of the job. If you do not like the job with high salary, every work-day is a struggle time to you .Further more in modern society the job changed very frequently if you have not enough interest to the job you do. 

The skills and experience of the job is approximately a important factor too. The abilities and experiences you study in the job is quite a treasure. Practically, though the market need different types of human resources. The cutting-edge skills and large field talents are more popular in the market and not only go further easily but also change the job.The skills are a well worth will accompany you whole life. In addition, salary also as a important factor. The situation is the background of everybody is different. If survive is emergency consideration, the salary is the most and first factor in that time.

Overall, salary obviously is a important factor. However, we should take the salary to the second consideration when the survive is not a problem. There are more factors influence you a lot. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> You should spend about 40 minutes on this task.

Write about the following topic：

In some countries, more and more people are hiring a personal fitness trainer, rather than playing sports or doing exercise classes.

What are the reasons for this? Is this a positive or a negative development?

Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience. <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'Viet Nam has experienced various periods of development throughout its history, but the modern era of development can be seen in the mid-1980s with the introduction of economic reforms known as “Renovation”. Since the early 2000s, Viet Nam has undergone significant changes in several aspects include economy, technology, infrastructure, education and healthcare.

 Firstly, Viet Nam has witnessed rapid economic growth, the continuous implementation that was initiated under the renovation strategy in the 1980s.

 Viet Nam has seen a significant rise, with gross domestic product GDP growing. Foreign investment inflows increased dramatically, and the development of industrial zones around the country. 

 Secondly, infrastructure development was a primary priority area in the early 2000s.

 Investments were made in transportation networks, energy systems, and urban infrastructure. Major projects, such as the construction of highways, bridges and airports.

 Thirdly, investing in education and healthcare promotes human and society development.

 The government expanded access to education at every level. They also reformed the curriculum. In the healthcare sector, the government improves healthcare services and upgrade medical facilities.

 In conclusion, the eary 2000s were a period of dramatic transformation for Viet Nam, defined by strong economic growth, social transformations, and infrastructure development. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Some teachers think that changing subjects with every lesson will help their students focus more. However, other teachers think that offering their students several lessons on the same subject in a row will help them focus more. Which opinion do you think is better? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'Some teachers claim that focus on the same subject help students construction, however the others state that does not work. In my opinion, I think that student spending time on the different subjects can help their score and develop their talent, this essay will discuss both sides.

Spending time on the different subjects can develop a student's talents. For instance some students may not be good at math but their PE class performance well. As a result, through the different classes  they obtain various opportunities to observe their gifts.

Furthermore, focusing on different classes increases students' horizons. For example, when student learn in high school, they have various classes, such as meth, lecture, geography...etc. These subjects give them different perspectives to know this word. In the end, they are obtained an amount of knowledge. 

On the other hand, some tutors indicate that learning different subjects lead to student's score decrease. The evidence  proves  that students have a lot of assignments need to do, as a result, student could not finish in a limited time. In addition, students feel frustrated by the homework and are not motivated to finish that. 

Overall,  I think that letting students accept various subjects is better than a single subject. Not only can develop their own characteristics, but also increase their foresight. <END_E>

A good reason to every year a lot of languages dead and many people think is not big because they can live easier in the future and I think it is important because all over the world there is a language actually International language which mostly people should learn and when they learn English they will be easier in the future and their own languages should not dead  and they have to speak and do not allow languages die out.

input:

 <START_E> 'Nowadays, a lot of people work longer hours and leaving little time for leisure activities. Hard working gives opportunity to growth carrier, earn more money and self-realization. From my point of view the advantages outweigh the disadvantages.

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Some people think that men and women have different qualities,there fore certain jobs are suitable for men and others for women.To what extent do you agree or disagree ? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'Each person will have a different quality,so there will be jobs that are more suitable for men and there will also be jobs that are more suitable for women.Persomally,I donot agree with this point of view\u003eThis essay will discuss my view specific reason and examples.

Every individual can follow their dream jobs,irrespective of gender.Nowadays,in modern society,both men and women can learn with similar education and opportunities to develop.Moreover,many places rely on certification and the ability to find employees.No quality and discrimination are a barrier that limits each person’s development.

Nowadays,the development of machines will reduce the advantages of men’s health,and heavy work suitable for men will disappear .And those jobs will be done by machines a robot in the near future.Jobs suitable for men will will decrease and be replaced by job both genders such as programming or tour guide jobs.

Of course,there will be some people who will have the opposite opinion.Foe example,in jobs require physical strength,women will not be able to keep to with men,and in jobs the require care and patience,women will have an advantages because most men ted to be angry.This view may correct,but many studies now show that when both genders work togethere,it creates a more inclusive and diverse environment.Because both ends have different strengthand weakness,they can suppot each other to develop and improve.

In conclusion,it is necessary to think differently about men and women in the workplace because individuals have the right to freedom and education to pursue their career dream. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> some people think that men and woman have different qualities, therefore certain jobs are suitable for men and others for women. To what extent do you agree or disagree? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'In recent times, due to disparities in physical and mental strengths, many people believe that occupational suitability for both genders are justifiable. One side, I personally agree with this statement, however, it is not true for some cases which will be discussed below.

Firstly, both men and women have distinguished traits in both physical capacify and mental healths which reason why some jobs just suitable for men and women. Especially, some jobs require physical strength which prefer to choose male instead of female. For instance, some jobs like workers in construction, garage or firefighter. In addition. women are also thought to be more suitable for certain jobs such as nurse, kindergarner,.... due to their charming, patienve and carefulness.

However, in modern society now, both males and females also fairly have oppotunities to look for their favorite jobs in the job market. While some position used to be considered as unsuitable for male or female in the past, these are open for both genders right now. For example, in the up-to-date society, females can get jobs in construction, garage,... and male also become a nurse or kidergarner.  

In conclusion, it is true for the aforementioned disparities in job selection, I believe that men and women at the moment are fair in terms of such an aspect of finding jobs. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Some people  think that men and women have different qualities, therefore certain jobs are suitable for men and others for women.

To what extent do you agree or disagree? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'Everyone person will have a different potential quality, so there will be jobs that are suitable for men while there will also some jobs which are better for women. This writer do not agree with this point of view and will give some evidences and examples.

 

Nowadays in the modern age, both men and women can learn with the same education. Moreover, there are no needs of discrimination bettween such sexes in promotion and places rely on certification and self-quality in works.

To the next point. The existance of machine, which including automatic robots that can replace men doing heavy jobs, which consequent in the decrease in males job. So that both gender will be equaly in jobs.

In contrast, there might be some individuals believe the opposite idea. Heavy jobs which are considered not fit with women,making them not keep up with men. Where as women has some advantages that is called disadvantage for men. It is indeed that both genders do have different strengths and weakness, but if they support each other, they will be more developed and improved as well.

In conclusion, both gender do have their ambition and potential quality in their jobs, so that we must think different about men and women in workplace. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Line Graph : The total oil consumption of four major consumers from 2009 to 2030 <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'vided into four various categories namely USA, China, Western Europe \u0026 Japan and Middle East, measured in million of barrels per day, between 2009 and 2030. Overall, a progressive growth pattern was recorded and is predicted in both the oil consumption of China and Middle East except for those of USA and Western Europe \u0026 Japan which have witnessed a recessive growth pattern. 

In terms of the USA’s oil consumption, it is always the highest category compared to any other. Increasing from precisely 9 to 10 which was its peak between 2009 and 2015, that data declined dramatically to merely 8 till 2024 before being predicted to a slight decrease to under 8 in 2030.

With regard to the amount of oil consumed of China and the Middle East , despite having a homogeneous initial point, they had distinction in the levels of growth. To be specific, the former experienced a 2 - fold increase from 2 to 4 in the first 15 - year period of time, which then will observe a marginal dwindling to over 3 from 2025 to 2030. The latter climbed consistently from 2 to 3 between 2009 and 2030.

With respect to the oil consumption of Western Europe \u0026 Japan, it went down from 4 to correctly 2 which experienced a 2 - fold decrease between 2009 and 2030. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> ‘Tourism is always a force for good which enables people of different countries to

understand each other.’

To what extent do you agree with this idea? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'The letter is being expressed my interest in this opportunity. I highly motivated to work at backbone.one as I am quite familiar with the subject, keen of innovation, and definitely support the idea, that energy can be transformed into money. In addition, I love to create, implement and develop IT products and I’m really good in it.

The first reason why I close to the topic about energy is that I have technical education. The second reason is about work experience. I have done some scientific works related to the energy, which included creating an IT systems. The first one was about saving money for energy sources due to technological process optimization based on computing modeling. The next was “Energy saving: scientific, technical and economic aspects of ensuring energy security. Economic justification for the feasibility of introducing cogeneration plants and energy-saving water treatment technologies at food industry enterprises”. I also lead, working as a creator of the concept and ideology as well, the research project “Energy and Economic Passports of Railways”, related to the development of a new system for accounting for the costs of fuel and energy resources of railways, ensuring their transparency and controllability.

I passionate about delivering fast and reliable systems and services designed to suit the needs of our customers and consumers. Last years I managed the team of developers, analysts, designers, and DevOps engineer and worked as a Product Lead and Product Owner. I worked as a Solution Architect in the big company starting her digital transformation.  As I can see, I can bring a great value to the company and I full of enthusiasm to do this. 

Due to my familiarity with business and system analyzing, ability to make quick researches, broad range mindset, and earned value management, I can easily create the best roadmap for the product, formulate the right requirements and show the benefits from implementation. (I presented my ideas and experience about requirements management at the PMI Business Analysis Conference, I was the only one from Europe as a speaker there and I have got a great feedback). I’ve released many products, WebApps as well, some of them are still working and developing. Additionally, I have a good taste in design. Before I created the task for the designer, I created the user stories and simple landing.

I am perfect at managing people and processes. I managed big projects, which were implementing on the big territory in the different time zones, by some teams and subcontractors. Depends on project, I use different methodologies, such as Waterfall, Agile (Scrum, Kanban mostly), or combine them. 

 Apart from team engagement and inspiration, I focus on our priorities to make sure that we meet our objectives on time and budget. Besides, I am good at work estimation, and evaluate team progress with different metrics. 

Moreover, I use metrics and product analysis to improve the product. I always work for the financial result. 

I am intelligent, creative, positive, flexible, curious, and active. I love reading, hiking, watching movies, and travelling. 

I would love to meet for an interview and discuss my contribution to your company. I am looking forward to hearing from you. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Some countries today have passed laws against smoking tobacco in public buildings such as

offices and restaurants. Other countries have no intention of doing this.

Consider the possible arguments on both sides of this debate, and reach your own conclusion on which side you favor. <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'In this day and age, there are plenty of people who consume tobacco, and they could have the benefit of some approval to smoke in some public places such as restaurants and offices. Although, some nations are putting effort into not allowing this legislation to happen. This essay will discuss the debate and give a concluding view.

On the one hand, those who support the idea of smoking in public simply wants to have freedom to do what they want. Consumer could insist that tobacco is their enjoyable habit, and every human being should have their own human rights to do what it gives them pleasure especially in workplaces, which makes them to have better output. For these people tobacco is the case.  For example, the severe kingdom in Iran had given the permission to their nation to have freedom of smoking. Furthermore, proponents could cite that tobacco gives them the opportunity to concentrate better. This kind of drug develop such calmness and relaxation that taker could be in an adequate situationship to think and work better in offices, which makes them to have a better output. Overall, this lawmaking amends the process of work for those who smoke. As an example, workers who can have their little competent thing, could regularly present in a satisfactory way.

However, opponent of smoking tobacco in specific place could claim that this action could endanger other’s state of health.  When consumers of tobacco smoke in closed room of eating place or working places, it seems that other attendees suffer from the smoky air, which it can later cause lounge cancer. For example, 20% of damage is belong to the smokers and the other 80% to the people who breath the poisoned air. Moreover, critics of this idea could cite that this unpleasant routine could show the city less aesthetic. Beauty of town should be saved due to the policy of tourists. When a state does not have the attraction no longer, it can damage country’s roll to the world. In this case opponents could say that smokers should be obliged to not do this troubled manner. Some Asian countries do not have a pretty look in other’s nationality mind.

In conclusion, I would side with the opponents of smoking tobacco in public places as restaurants and offices. It seems reasonable that state of health and beauty of city are more essential than enjoying and have a dangerous freewill of smoking. <END_E>

There are many online tutorials and various reading materials available. meanwhile, I also use mobile communications for tutorials. we are the president who created various internet and technology facilities for the youth.
