instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Many people believe that it is easier to have a healthy lifestyles in the countryside. other believe that there are health benefits of living in cities. discuss both view and give your opinion. <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'Countries involve of several government.The government including cities and this cities contains of many villages. Most of the people argue that living in cities more healthy than living in the villages.In my opinion living in countryside is more beneficial than ther place.

First of all, in the past, people living were more fresh water and green grave.There are looking at availability of water and fresh food for themselves and their animals when they are decid to built home or when leave one place to other for living.More ver, most of them do not think about infrastructure because of it was not availability that times and also, they do not interesting to education  and entertainment ,they just happy from small things,such as, play football with their peers in their village . For example, Bedouin people always travel from place to other only because of reacher for water and food .

Secondly, today youner generation looking for ward to big cities where every things available.in addition,They are always think about their job and future of their children when they decide to built home should be near their job , school , hospital, mall and good entertainment . For instance,omani youner built their houses in Muscat. In Muscat region every things available such as, jobs, a lot of good privat and government school, hospital provid by good high quality technology , parks, several mall spread in All area .

In conclued,there are a lot of people prefer living in cities . In my opinion , I still strongly believe that living in your village more healthy in the sense of relaxation and good health, were be near of your family and you relative. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> more and more countries are making university education completely free for their citizens. What are the advantages and disadvantages of this development? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'In the modern era, many people believe that diverse countries supported education fee has many benefits because everybody can study their major regardless their economic background. Personally, I believe our government have to support university tution fees.

THere are several clearly few merits of get free tuition fee to students. The most notable one is that every students can go university and they can graduate. Some people cannot enter unversity cause their poor economic situation and a few students cannot graduate the same reason. Secondly, they can choose university  they wish to attend. In Korea, some people cannot go to the university that they wish because mostly excellent university located our capital city. So they choose other cities' universities cause of they cannot bear the expenses such as housing and tution fees. Last but not least, country development is followed by education. Because, school can make their student as a specialisit in promising fields such as IT and medicine.

In spite of the above-mentioned issues, some people assert that student need not any subsidy for their university study. The main disadvantage is that some students do not want to graducate their university. For example, in Gernamy, they already practice this policy however, few people do not graudate because the school benefits are massive. As a result, it can leads to waste tax. Additionally, a closer examination would reveal that quality of education will be equal. Because, some countries has different education quality in accordance with tuition fees.

Considering the abovie views, it is celar that, although there are some negative aspects of nation finance, the merits will continue to outweigh the demerits. Thus, our nation have to make policy about this issue. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> When you learn a foreign language, all four skills（listening, reading, speaking and writing) are equally important. To what extent do you agree or disagree？ <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'Nowadays, there are a lot of people who think that the best way to reduce the crime rate is to educate criminals while they are still in prison.

On the one hand, criminals can find a job after their terms in prison. It helps to fit into society and prevent crimes. Moreover, the time prisoners spend studying teaches them how to work in a team, this way they easily can find friends. Furthermore, this innovation averts violation that could happen if it would be free time. 

On the other hand, It is unprofitable for administration, because there are a lot of people who don’t want to study and the only cause of their wish to do it is absence of hard work that they could get in the lack of studying hours. In addition, there are a lot of prisoners who are incorrigible criminals. In my opinion it is no reason to teach this kind of person, education is not suitable for people who have caused serious body harm or sold drugs.

To conclude, I want to say that prisons should make tests which thoroughly give a description of prisoner and in a base of these tests invite people to study. Maybe it costs a lot, but it is not waste of money on education for person who killed someone. If we want to make this world better the price is not matter to us. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> The best way to reduce emissions from vehicles is to impose a higer tax on vehicles which use a lot of fuel and lower tax on those that don't. 

To what extent do you agree or disagree? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'Nowadays, because of the global warming, the emission of vehicles becomes a serious problem for every nations all over the world, some people think it is the best way to make those who drive traditional vehicles to pay more tax than those who drive elecronic cars. To be honest, I share a different opinion.

    I regard we have to admit that, vehicles which use fuel did influnced our evirnoment a lot, and it is a good way to impose tax on those drivers. The action of add tax maybe can reduce some emission from those vehicles, but I have to say the effect will be limited.

    For one thing,if  the tax policy was acted, it will lower the life quality of  working class people while the rich people won't feel much difference. The users of fuel powered vehicles a lot are usually whealthy people, especially those who drives cars like landrovers and fancy race cars, these cars bruns way more fuel per meils than ordinary cars. For working class people, they won't need a tax to make them change their old car to elechronic cars. So that, tax on fuel powered vehicles might not be very useful.

   One thing for another, if government dose imposed the tax, the question to be asked is what will government do with the income. Government held elections every 4 or 5 years in most of countries. It usually takes years to pass the law about the tax, and tax on every fuel powered car driver for 1 or 2 years, then they hold a relection, new government maybe the axe the tax, because the citizens elect them for that. After all these, those tax money will be used on other things.

    In conclusion, to reduce the traditional vehicles users the best way is not to add tax on them. There are many other ways like developing new cars use electricity and let people know about our environment via news or education. Pleople will atomaticaly change their car if new elechronic cars are more advance and more econimical friendly to them. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Many of the world’s cities are currently facing a serious housing shortage. What are some of the reasons for this shortage and what solutions can you suggest? Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience. <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'Nowadays, housing crisis have emerged as one of the most pressing challenges in urban areas around the world. Rapid urbanization, population growth, and increasing economic disparities have contributed to a shortage of affordable housing, skyrocketing rents, and homelessness. 

One of the primary causes of the housing crisis in cities is the imbalance between supply and demand. Many cities are facing a significant mismatch between the supply of housing and the increasing demand due to factors such as limitied land avilability, strict zoning regulations, and slow construction processes. Additionally, income inequality is another factor contributing to the housing crisis. Rising income disparities exaberate the situation, making it increasingly difficult for low-income indivisuals and families to afford suitable housing options. 

Addressing the housing crisis requires comprehensive and innovative solutions. I will suggest some strategies for tackling them. First, cities can implement affordable housing programs that provide subsidies, incentives, or partnerships with developers to increase the avilability of affordable housing units. This can be achieved through government fundings, tax breaks, or regulations that mandate a certain percentage of affordable units in new developments. 

Aside from that, cities can review and update their zoining regulations to allow for higher-density development, mixed-used neighborhoods, and inclusiory zoining. Inclusionary zoining mandates a certain percentage of affordable housing in new developments, ensuring that socioeconomic diversity is maintained as neighborhoods evolve.

 In conclusion, people have to pay attention to the change of economic policies of a country and government should make a effort for solving problems consistantly. these methods can alleviate problems of a housing shortage and can make the society more inclusive, equitable and thriving. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Nowadays, not enough students choose science subjects in university in many countries. What are the reasons for this problem? What are the effects on society? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'It is not undoubtedly that science play a vital role in society. However, in contemporary times, most students become demotivation to take science courses. This issue certainly has many causes and impacts for communities. Thus, this essay will look of both reasons and results.

Many pupils claim that learning science is quite difficult to do because it needs critical thinking, high attention to detail and hard working. Science offers challenging field to solve like complex formula in math as well as physic. Owing to this condition, they choose others subjects that offer less challenges and easy way to handle. Although it also has its benefits for future, students still prefer to avoid science. For examples, arts subjects (music, writing, drawing, ect) and social subjects provide convenient for them. It is clear that recent times students avoid science due to its complexity and choose others subjects to feel relax living their school life.

Eventually, in the future, nations might become have less reasearches and have fewer remarkable discoveries because it will be difficult to fill science fields and it will less of jobseekers. In contrast to social fields, it will more individuals to apply and will have high competition among jobseekers. Both of this effects could be handled if they have strong personal brandings and equip their selves with soft skills.

To sump up, most students become demotivation to take science courses because its diffult tasks, as a result they prefer to social subjects that offers comfortable and easier. Moreover, they should have strong personalities and skills to handle the effects. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Is it important to be ethical all the time.' What are the advantages

and disadvantages of being ethical all the time? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'Why is it important to be ethical at all times - good question that I will give my opinion and only my opinion to the advantages and disadvantages.

The word ethical is of Greek ethos meaning ' moral character' which is describing a persons behaviour - being honest, fair and truthful. Many people are ethical through their jobs such as a doctor, judge, minister or teacher and follow this ridgidly so there can be no come back on them in their chosen profession even if , for example a patient is abusive or rude to their Doctor, that medical professional will still treat their patient fairly however affronted they they feel.

The disadvantage to being ethical all the time is that a person can be taken advantage of by other person who know full well that it doesn't matter how offensive or rude they are they will still be treated fairly , and this is an daily issue for the above mentioned work professionals, but the same can be said for a vicar or minister who are always ethical within their work.

I have no actual examples to give as i have not been in a situation to give any but I can honestly say I am not 100% ethical myself but i do feel I am reasonably fair and just until I am crossed. 

Is it important to be ethical all the time, it may well be but as we all know it isn't always possible to be so unless you have sworn an oath to be so. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> In many countries, children are becoming overweight and unhealth. Some people think that the government has the responsibility to solve this problem. 

To what extent do you agree or disagree <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'Over the last few years, offspring are increasing level become outweight and unhealthy. Some people argue that the country has the responsibilitiy to tackle this issue. While there is some truth to this belief, l would disagree with this point of view for some sound reasons. 

On the one hand, the government has the respond to health of young generations. The main argument has to overeat caused of children overweight and also the government should be has to solve this issues. To explain, the goverenment have to banned unhealthy foods for juveniles or they do not need to produced and selling because this situation may be is very damage for young genarations. As a result reduce level become overweight among younger. For example, some countries banned sugar goods, fast foods sell to population. Beside that the sociaty recommented to overeat more walk, run and sport such this rules helped to unhealthy. If USA would not banned sell some damage foods in their places, people would were suffer from some disease yet. 

On the other hand,  the government has not the responsibility to solve this issues because their has other matter problem than this condition. Moreover, not only society fathers and mothers should be respond to their health or children health problem. The government always can not observe to overeat if their populations. However, parents can helped to yheir boys and girls that is they can self-esteem as well as younger too. For example, l do not buy unhealth goods because l do know they damage foods  l do not eat. As a result l am not overweight among my freinds. In a word, the society has not compulsory to tackle this problem. 

In conclution, the government should banned  some products to offspring and people do not need to overeating because this is very benefits of their health. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Many young people today spend a lot of time playing electronic game.

Is this a positive or negative development? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'In the modern world, network and electronic game development year by year so many adults is spend a lot of time to this thing, it is development is negative for all people and country because if in one country teenage spend differently game their time, in this urban almost every player  people will be physically ill and their has eyes problem.

 Young people is using from phone in the world. They are using for differently things for example, learn other language, speak with friend and family members and another,   however, nowadays adults is using for bad games especially for electronic game it is position give bad effect to their life and healthy. Besides that, almost all parents buy phone and computer for their children. In my opinion, at the time parents think their children using only call additionally learn differently things, books from phone but teenager interesting better electronic game from  book so electronic game development year by year. For instance, if some  young people play electronic game, they can attract other teenager and this game  increase   in this place.

Young people think all time will be dependent with network in consequence they lose a lot of time and their eyes healthy. If we watch more time to phone at one day, our eyes will be ill. Almost all cluntryes increase  electronic game so young people wearing spectacles but in our opinion, if one children wear glasses, the will read many book, he is very clever. Moreover, people played game in their childhood, they will not find good job in the future consequently we have to read book in our childhood, need not electronic game us. As revealed by, all people have to take knowledge or learned job their childhood due to it is situation give good effect in the future, they will be rich man.

In conclusion, young people us get playing electronic game from phone these day. From my prospective, parents did not buy phone for their children because phone give bad effect for teenager's eyes healthy. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Nowadays, a growing number of people with health problems are trying alternative medicines and treatments instead of visiting their usual doctor.

Do you think this is a positive or a negative development?

Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience. <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'In the recent years, the amount of folks who want to go to the clinics or hospitals are decreasing, and replace them with alternative medicines. Personally, I consider there comes pros and cons.

On the one hand, if patients were under ailment, they might go to the drug store for healing. It is helpful to make the society resources can run more effectively and efficiently. Take Taiwan for example, Taiwan is famous for its cheap medical fee, this policy let poor can afford the expense of treatment bills, however, it also has caused  numerous problems. The most serious issue is that citizens in Taiwan are used to wasting health care resources, it is common that many sick people rush into every clinic even they only need a few days to recover. If these persons can seek other treatment on their own, they will not stand the social resources and those patients under critical illness can accept the best therapy.

One the other hand, it is a negative development because the percentage of people mislead lethal drugs is increasing. Most of time, they do not realize the function and side effect of medicine and treatment, some people may be allergic to some ingredient, therefore cause more severe healthy problem. For instance, in some countries, the cost of medical care is too high so they are cheated by quacksalver who say that they only need to pay halve bill. However, it is frequently reported in the newspaper that these frauds are murderers, many residents die because of them.

In conclusion, people can receive useful care on their own, doctors will spend more saving more lives, while some of them do not get the right treatment. As a result, I think it is a advantaged and disadvantaged development. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Some people believe that children who commit crimes should be punished. Others think that children’s parents should be punished instead. 

Discuss both views and give your opinion. <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'Many individuals think that parents of juveniles should take their responsibility to be punished when their children commit crimes. However, others believe that youngsters should get their own punishment. In my opinion, parents are responsible people because juveniles are still liable.

On one hand, crimes that children commit are dangerous if parents should be responsible, because of the deterrent effect. It can make them not feel repentance and they will repeat to commit more crimes. The punishment which they get should be the deterrent effect for them that works effectively to reduce crimes rate in children, so it is better to give them the high level punishment. Moreover, it can make other childrens scared to commit more crimes resulting in good habits and it will increase countries prosperity, particularly better young generations.

On the other hand, punishment for youngsters who commit crimes is prohibited in some countries, depending on law. Children are still under nurture of parents, consequently parents should handle and get the punishments if they commit crimes. Furthermore, parents play essential roles to educate them how to avoid criminals and give real examples in life. Therefore, they can adapt and copy life rules of their parents which is a good coping mechanism for juveniles personality.

All in all, parents play a crucial role in nurturing their children in a good way, so their children can avoid committing crimes. Parents are the most responsible humans for their children. Therefore if their children commit crimes, they should be punished. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Some university students want to learn about other subjects in addition to their main subjects. Others believe it is more important to give all their time and attention to studying for a qualification.

Discuss both these views and give your own opinion. <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'Studying more than one major is pretty common these days, but some worry about lack of expertise compared to single major. In this essay, we will discuss both views and figure out which one could be better.

From point of the single major, students can grow professionalism by concentrating just one field. Students can ensure enough time for studying, compared to multiple major. Even though they could not achieve satisfying grade, they could give another chance, which ensure certain knowledge and high grade. Majors connected to mathematics and physics could be an adequate example because of its difficulty.

On the other hand, students with more than one major could experience versatile range of study which give students chance to find major that interests them. In bachelor’s degree, students can not experience deep dive to certain major because of its wide range of field. Personally, bachelor’s degree aims to find a course that encourages students, and those who want to study more would consider Master’s degree and study deeper. Moreover, having various experience in multiple major could help finding a job more easily, enables applying more wide range of fields.

To sum up, there are pros and cons in both area, thus I personally think having more multiple major could be better. In modern society which artificial intelligent is improving rapidly, having just single knowledge could be dangerous, because it is easy to alternate. Combining multiple fields enables finding a great insight, which is the key of competitive among the other applicants. Therefore, I find more than one major could be better. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> In many countries, women never feel need to get married. Some people believe that this is because women are able to earn and therefore do not require financial security that marriage can bring. To what extent do you agree or disagree? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'In the past, women were accustomed to marry once they reach a certain age. However, in the contemporary society, ladies tend to refrain from marriage and prefer living by themseleves. Many believe the reason behind this change as women being financially independent in the present world. According to my perspective in addition to the aforementioned fact, there are several reasons behind this phenomenon. In the forthcoming paragraphs, I will elaborate on this in more detail.

To begin with, back in the days men were breadwinners and females were housewives in an ordianry family. Hence, females used to solely rely on their husbands for financial support. In other words marriage was essential for women to survive. However, with the change of time more females choose to pursue higher education and choose a career path. This provided financial freedom and an independent lifestyle. Therefore, marriage has become an option.

In addition, to the independent life style society started valuing equality among men and women. Many became feminists. And started to believe that a women's main job is not upbring children and taking care of a family. Thus, emotional freedom and well being also became an important aspects of life. For instance, ladies started following their dreams like travelling around the world, exploring new adventures and living a free life without any family responsibility. Moreover, some women cannot accomodate taking care of a child with their busy life styles and other life goals.

In conclusion, females choose single lives mainly because they can earn money. In addition, there are numerous reasons why women choose not to marry. However, this lead the society to view marriage in a different perspective. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Nowadays people waste a lot of food that was bought over the world. Why do you think people waste food? What can be done to reduce the amount of food they throw away? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'In recent times, there has been an increase in people purchasing food at restaurants but being unable to finish it, resulting in food wastage. This is mainly due to huge appitite to eat but they cannot complete the whole portion that they ordered. This issue can be resolved by educating people about the wastage.

One of the significant problem with food hotels is wastage. Generally, in many places people orders more than three items in the menu. Although, they cannot finish all the dishes that they orderd but people want to experinces the taste of the dish. Moreover, the left overs cannot be taken home because they spoil quickly. Therefore, people throw the remaining food, causes food wastage. For example, recent studies in India shows that 60% of the food wastage is due to the people ordering more number of items than their hunger. 

One of the possible solution for this issue to give awarness to the public. There are plenty problems associated with soplied food this such as pollution, increase in insets and deseases. However, many individuals are not aware of these problems. In every food place there should be an advertisment of these problems. Government should allocate funds and run social campaines. For example, In India one restaurant charges more if the customer leave any food item that they order.

To conclude, customers play an important role in wasting food by ordering more, however this can be taken care by providing valuable education to the people for this problem. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Large companies should pay higher salaries to CEOs and executives than to other workers.To what extent do you agree or disagree？ <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'It is sometimes argued that whether corporation is ought to pay higher stipends to CEOs and executives or not.While I completely support that the CEOs and executives deserve a better treatment.

 The executives are qualified for better treatments for owning more precious experience.The executives are always the seasoned staff who found the enterprise or participated in at an early period, they are more familiar with the market and personal management which matters a lot in administering the working programs well.Such as the task distribution and personnel arrangement.Additionally, the better pay is considered as higher working class along with esteem from other staffs,which will provide them a sense of achievement.

The people who enjoy a prior tier in company are equipped with higher education background and has undertaken though series of practical challenges.When confronting with problems or dilemma, the scientific and appropriate decisions made by them can directly judge the fate of the company.Besides, they are prone to have a broadened social relationship and connections that promote the cooperation between enterprises which do help to the development of the company.It is universally acknowledged that the trend in contemporary business environment is to work with others and cooperation opportunities erected by executives play an indispensable role in enhancing the competitiveness.

In conclusion，I agree that corporation is supposed to give CEOs and executives a higher pay and I am firmly convinced that company that provide higher salary to executives will perform well and be able to avoid pitfall in the future development. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> In some countries there are more young people choosing to enrol in work-based training instead of attending university.

Do the advantages of this situation outweigh the disadvantages?

Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience. <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'In some states, there is an increasing trend within the young generation that prefers to attend vocational training rather than entering university. I think this trends' advantages are more outweigh than disadvantages because this kind of trainings cost-effective than universities, and it saves time. 

Firstly, attending vocational trainings' cost would be cheaper than fees of universities, therefore, it is cost-effective for youths. Especially, adolescences who do not have enough money for university degree is better to go vocational courses because some of trendy majors' trainings are offered by free or cheaper than universities. Therefore, it is great chance to be prepared as a skilled worker. For instance, in Mongolia, construction workers are trained by free in Builders college of Mongolia.  

Another advantage is that its saves time because most colleges usually offer semesters which means   usually the duration years. As a result, youth can hold professional certificate shortly and reach their financial independence. For example, my one of friend is living in good condition compared to others because she started her own salon after her graduation of hair-dressing course while others were still going to their university. 

On the other hand, there is might be some drawbacks such as low demands of job positions and low-reputation. However, as long as skilled person can tackle these perspectives without suffering. Their skill and qualities will be their indicator of success, therefore, doing on the work-based training is more valuable than academic pursue. 

To conclude, there should not be judge on youngsters who want to be skilled workers instead of achieving academic integration. This is because on the job based training courses are cheaper, and it offers financial freedom for skilled professionals. However, there are might be some constraints, even though anyone can overcome this situation with their talent and true passion. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> In many countries, fast food is becoming cheaper and more widely available.

Do the disadvantages of this outweigh the advantages? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'Nowadays,many people prefer to  fast foods and they think that  fast foods are cheap and it is delicious. It is true that, may be fast food is cheap however it is not quality.

On the one hand, in recent times, the numerous individuals love consuming  fast food because, it is cheap and may be delicious but it is not healthy food. Moreover, it is impact our life very bad and it is cause of obese and different bad diseases but nobody can undersant this and it has more  demirits than merits, even it has not advantages. In fact, in the United States, 37% of adults and  childrens consume fast food every day. And it is the worst way to eat. That is true, the fast food is a popular choice for it is taste and convenience, but it tends to be high in calories, fat and low in nutrients. Eating fast food frequently may negatively affect multiple areas of your body, possibly increasing your risk of conditions including type 2 diabetes, obesity and high blood pressure and if you to be a fat person. A part from that, fast food contains loads of fat and calories which can lead to obesity and heart problem.For instance, if you a fat person,your heart cover by fat and it is cause of die. A double quarter pounder meal with a coke contains nearly  1800 calories. Considering the average person needs 2000 calories daily, this means that one meal has nearly filled the needed calories for the day.

On the other hand, in most fast food operations, menu items are generally made from processed ingredients prepared at a central supply facility and then shipped to individuals were they are reheated cooked or assembled in a short amount of time.The fast foods  include hamburger, hot dogs, french fries,pizza tacos,burritos, salads, sandwiches and other junk foods. The worst thing of the fast food is attract everyone and it is include mayonnasie and it is bad for our life, too.

In a nutshell, the fast food has only drawbacks and it is bad. Thus, if we want to be a healthy person, we must limit to eat junk food. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> In some countries, more and more people are becoming interested in finding out about the history of the house or building they live in. What are the reasons for this? How can people research this? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'With increasing number of residents and the introduction of publicly available resources like internet people are more curious and more eager to find the heritage and history behind thier residental area. 

The luxuray of public resources and online forums have not always been around. Before the age of technology people had to refer to people in thier neibuorhood for information about the place they live in or had to look around finding any evidence that something or someone was there. But with the recent advantages of science and connectivity of people from around the globe, residents can learn about the place they are living in with click of a bottun. Despite these inovations, niebuors are still one of the most used and in some cases, the only resource is available to some less populated areas.

Humans are natrually curious creatures adn the need for more information about the place they live in is encoded in thier brains. During the industrial revelotion and some big wars after that era, people couldn’t efford to live where ever they wanted and had to endure the harsh situation they lived in. So natrually the need to know about the history of thier residential area was completly ignored and so almost forgot. But in recent years, people having safer enviorments and more reliable incomes has caused them to try to fulfill that need again.

In recent years of technological advances, and in one of the most well connected times of human history, people have the most access and also desire to figure out the history behind their house that they are living in. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Some people feel that manufacturers and supermarkets should have the responsibility to reduce the amount of packaging of goods, while others argue that customers should avoid buying goods with a lot of packaging. Discuss both these views and give your own opinion. <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'There are controversial perspectives heating a debate over commodities packaging. While some claim that is indispensable for producers and supermarkets to take liability for mitigating the amount of goods packaging, the other makes a statement that it is vital for buyers to avoid purchasing commodity with a myriad of packaging. Each opinion has its own perks, I would contend that it is ideal to combine both mentioned factors. 

Without a shadow of a doubt, manufacturers and supermarkets play a significance role in alleviating packages of goods. This is owing to the fact that by doing so the environment can be prevented from pollution. To be more specific, factories can manufacture their commodities with greener materials such as using paper bags which can be reusable for abundant times. Moreover, supermarkets can reduce this situation by giving extra voucher for any customers who do not utilize the original packages but bring their own bags. Therefore, it is crucial for producers and supermarkets to mitigate the quantity of packaging of their goods.

While the role of reducing packages of commodities by manufacturers and supermarkets is widely acknowledged, it is dispensable for shoppers to refuse spending money on goods with lots of packaging. This is probably because their activity can contribute to environment conservation. Specifically, customers can make use of recycle packages such as tote bags to carry out their products whenever they go out for shopping. Therefore, buyers should put premium on avoiding purchasing commodities with a huge of packaging.

In conclusion, manufacturers and supermarkets need to accountable for alleviating the quality of commodities’ packages. Moreover, it is crucial for customers to prevent utilizing goods with a wealth of packaging. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Working from home, some think as beneficial some people think it may distract the family routine.

Discuss both views and what is your opinion? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'In contemporary times, remote working has become a debated issue. Some people claim that working from home has many benefits while others believe that people will procrastinate by family activities. This essay will start look at the arguments for it before turning to those against it. In spite of the against, I firmly believe that working online can foster work-life balancing. 

Individuals who work from home think that its offer some advantages like they can supervise their toodlers during the working hours. Another reason think that they can spend more times with their family or can work from anywhere such as working from abroad. Certainly this can cultivate work-life balancing in society. Furthermore, either companies or employees have a positive benefit to saving money for cutting their budgets. Although it might be have drawbacks, it plays a vital role for envinronment to reduce vechicles on the road and traffics, so it can decline the air pollution.

Conversely, others say that people will not effective if they work from home because they will procrastinate with their personal activities such as nurturing their children. As a result, they will not focus to finish their tasks or projects quickly. Moreover, at their houses, there is not a work atmosphere in order to make people lazy to work as well as they will have a lack of communication or social life among the employees. 

To sum up, working from home has benefits outweigh the drawbacks. In my point of view, fostering a work-life balancing in communities through this issue can maintain people mental health. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> In many countries today, crime novels and TV crime dramas are becoming more and more popular. Why do you think these book and TV shows are popular? What is your opinion of crime fiction and TV crime dramas? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'Recently, the pople watching the crime TV shows and the books with vilonce stories are increasing in every nation. This is beacuse many people are curious to know crimes and these drams are interesting to watch.  I believe that many people are breaking the law by reading and watching these shows.

Firstly, many individuals are spending their time to understand the crime patterns by reading fiction stories. People often imagine themself while reading the book and tries to figure out the solution for crime incident. Secondly, many individual feels crime drama are interesting to watch compared to other geners. This is because most of the story happens at nigh, Thus, it create suspence and tension for most of the viewers. For example, all of the Netflix top successful shows contain vilonce and law breaking sequnces because the viewership for these shows are high compared to Romance.

To my way of thinking criminals are increasing after watching and reading these stories. After writing the books they are availabe to everyone. Therefore, no one knows the intenstion of a buyer. Furthermore, TV series are availabe across the internet. Most of the teenagers are watching these series and getting influnced to do crime and beleve that they can get out without any police charges. For example, a group of youngstres planned to heist a bank in India. They were arrested by Indian police and in press note officer mentioned that they are influnced by web series called Money heist to commit these robbery. 

In conclusion, there is a rise in people who watches and read the crime novels, However, i think people are getting motivated to do illigal activities after watching these series. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> The world has  many  towns  and  cities constructed in previous centuries that were more suitable and livable  for  people in those times than they are now. What problems will this cause today  and  what can be done  to  solve these problems? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'It is apodictic that the advancements in the technology has brought tremendous changes in the society. The living styles and previously constructed areas have changed alot, as such areas are not acceptable by people to live there. These kind of suburbs cause various problems to the folks, which are discussed in the ensuing paragraphs along with the plausible solutions.

To commence with, the infrastructure of the past is not suitable for the current generation, as the needs of the people have been changed alot. For example; most of the previous constructions were not made keeping parking for the modern vehicles in mind, making it hard for the current use. Therefore, such places require huge moditications and more space. As a result, it becomes difficult for the individuals to do repair work which demands extensive labour and extra money. Thus, they always prefer to migrate into advanced areas rather than modifying the old ones.

One of the plausible solutions of this issue, is that there should be the renovation of such structures

without changing their core formations. Moreover, the municipal corporations and governments can play their role by providing various convenient techniques and tools to the denizens for modifications. For example, improving the waste management and sewage systems based on the current systems and a better infrastructure around them. Thus, the human beings can have the basic facilities of living in an area. Besides that, more funds can be introduced by the officials for bringing new facilities into  the old towns.

To conclude, the presence of the old buildings and outdated layouts can be the hindrance of development but by sustainable solutions, communities can strive towards fexible environments that meet the needs of ongoing and upcoming generations: <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> 48.Some people say that outdoor activities benefit children's development rather than computer games. To what extent do you agree or disagree with this statement? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'Some individuals argued that those activities which children can play outside are more beneficial than computer games . This essay agrees with the statement because physical activities help in maintaining better health as well as get opportunity to learn some skills with each other , both these benefit help in the growth of the children.

Outside activities include running, soccer , basketball etc plays very important role to maintain healthy lifestyle for children . The major issues every parents facing that their children gaining weight due the number of hours children spending on screens for study as well as playing games on smartphones . Therefore , outdoor games helps to reduce the overweight issues by doing physical activities as well as these activities do not give strain to children eyesight also . For example, research shows that most of the children in the United Kingdom's gain their weight due to lack of physical activities.

Another reason is that outdoor games involves children to learn skills like team work ,time management and improves social interaction also . In other words ,  if a group of children plays together then they understand the importance of the other team mates and this gives opportunity to children to improve social interaction which helps in boost their confidence level and build motivation also. 

In conclusion , people should give priority to outdoor games in order to improve their children healthy lifestyle and also provide opportunity to children to learn leadership skills. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> There is a general increase in anti-social behaviours and a lack of respect for others. What are the causes and solutions? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'Nowadays more people tend to behave antisocially and there is a decline in respect for other people. There could be several reasons for that.

One of the causes of the current increase in anti-social behaviour might be rooted in the ubiquious technological development, which has resulted in the decline in personal communication and the rise of human-machine interaction. Thus, we tend to interact more with the software than with human beings resulting in more antisocial actions. This problem might be solved by promoting the idea of interpersonal activities, communities and interest based clubs, which could encourage kinder and more amicable behavour. 

Another reason for the lack of respect in everyday situations could be possibly that of the shortage of attention paid to the development of soft skills and emotional intelligence at schools. So, when graduates enter the fast paced productivity-oriented work environment they find themselves lacking empathy and ethical behavior, which not only hinders communication, but also results in smaller productivity. This can be solved early by implementing emotional intelligence classes in compulsory education at schools.

Finally, the lack of mutual respect can also be rooted in the modern trend for assertiveness and brutality, which are oftentimes overestimated and promoted on social media. The cases of anti-social behavior have often been mistakenly shown as 'cool', which has led to more young people devaluating basic human virtues. The only possible solution to this can be in more spotlight hogged by the idea that kindness and respect are foundations for the successful life and traits of a strong personality.

Overall, the issue of anti-social behaviour and the lack of mutual respect is quite acute, however there are a few solutions that could tackle it. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Some people work for the same organization all their working life. Others think that it is better to work for different organisations.

Discuss both therse views and give your own opinion. <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'In contemporaries times, the majority of employees intend to work for fixed corporations, while others assert that it is better to change jobs if needed. This essay attempts to shed light on both perspectives before concluding that I am in favor for the latter notion.

On the one hand, it is understandable why individuals who insist on being loyal workers could be advantageous to a certain extent. First and foremost, it could guarantee the stability of staffs' lives. For example, besides their basic salaries, experienced employees could receive additional bonuses as a tribute to their dedication, which could help them easily cover their daily costs, such as accommodation, food, and bills. Furthermore, taking part in only one firm could support workers have successful career paths. This is because without worrying about financial burden, members of the company could focus on studying a particular field more deeply, thereby leading them to become professional experts but also taking on higher positions in the firms.

On the other hand, there are a host of compelling reasons as to why I am convinced that altering different organisations could have significant benefits. One rationale is that it could improve jobholders' wages. In fact, they are likely to be paid higher than their current payments when they change jobs, thus, this is an opportunity to raise their incomes as well as the quality of their lives. Another justification is that new workplaces could provide a better developing environment. To be more specific, jobholders could find suitable company that adapt their aims, such as broadening experiences, learning relevant job skills, and creating networking, which could play a role as motivators and satisfactory to encourage staffs to work more efficiently.

In conclusion, while it is irrefutable that staying in the same enterprise for the whole life brings numerous valuable results, I would contend that entering alternative organisations is more beneficial. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Some people believe that teenagers should be required to do unpaid community work in their free time as it is beneficial for the community and teenagers as well. To what extend do you agree with the statement. <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'Some individuals are of the view that teenagers should be required to do community work without any remuneration as this could be beneficial for the teenagers and community both. I do not agree with the statement and my views are in the following paragraphs. 

To begin with, the spare time of the teenagers is a very precious element of their life. To explicate, the individuals requir a lot of time to learn about and explore the outside world in their young age. Further, the life skills like communication and other interpersonal skills are inculcated in this age. This knowledge is very important for the overall growth of an individual as it would be necessary for them to communicate and coordinate with others. It could be said that as a rose blossoms only when it remains untouched and unharmed, so is the case of young individuals. Hence, they could not be burdened with other responsibilities. 

On the contrary, it is crucial to consider that the community works could develop a sense of oneness among the teenagers who participate in them. Adding to it, there are many opportunities that the youngsters get when they participate in the community work. For instance ; distributing food to the poor people might lead to a sense of compassion and kindness in the youngersters. Moreover, they also get to socialize with the individuals of their age. Thus, this leads to an overall growth of the participants. 

To conclude, the teenagers should spend their time working on their own goals or to explore their own interests rather than being forced to follow someone else's orders. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Pressure on the school and universities store and is increasing and students are forced to to hard work when they are young do you think it is a positive or negative development <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'Nowadays,  tremendous interest in learning and teaching has rise the pressure on  educational institutions. Thus, requesting students  to do a lot of work at school and their home. In my opinion, l truly agree that we need to take quick action towards  this matter.

To begin with, The people who argue that students should not learn under pressure, they have their convincing reasons. The main reason is these days the psychology issues have  Increased among the puplis as a result of learning pressures. For instance, recent studies prove that the number of students who suffer from depression have increased from 30% to 50% during the last five years. In my university, for example, there are a large number of students who are stopping from attendance to class and prefer to start their job because of the enormous of Responsibilities and challenges they have faced during their studies. 

On the other hand, some of people argue that puplis all over the world must learn under pressure to learn effectively. Besides, there are a lot of studies prove that students should take a large of responsibilities to enhance their learning.

 Furtheremore, the tutors only take the guiding roles to decrease the pressures on students and advice them to facilitates their tasks. 

In conclusions , l strongly agree that learning is important, but the students' psychology  is more sgnifi! cant . Therefore, teachers must helping  students to learn effectively without suffereing from mental and psychological problems. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Nowadays the way many people interact with each other has changed because of technology. 

In what ways has technology affected the types of relationships people make? 

Has this become a positive or negative development? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'in today's technological world, an individual's lifestyle has changed in various ways, especially in terms of interaction.  this essay will discuss the positive and negative effects.

on the one hand, increasing the use of technology has affected  people's lives. consider the time when people used latter or Animals to transmit messages, but today people can communicate through smartphones or computers with a few clicks. because of technology, communication is much more easier for individuals. Moreover, machinery made also strong long-distance bonds. people can share a lot of information by posting a video or uploading images on social media, such as Facebook or Instagram.

by contrast, there are a few drawbacks of technology. for example,  more use of smartphones or computers can be harmful to physical or mental activities. in addition, a student studying abroad misses the time he spends playing with his father and family members. Furthermore, we also considered that increasing radiation can be effected on our physical health. so poor societies have difficulty connecting national networks, and low-speed progress in these areas is inevitable.

in conclusion, technology has a lot of advantages but we will  consider that it can be harmful to our health. in future, technology will become more beneficial for children and young adults. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Many museums charge for admission while others are free

Do you think the advantages of charging people for admission to museums outweigh the disadvantages <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'Nowadays, lots of museums where most ancient features are preserved are establishing. Purpose of all museums built is help to people recognize and have knowledge about history. Whereas, some  museums require cost to visit it, while other museum facilities are free. In this essay, i will discuss about pros and cons of requiring admission to enter museums.

On the one hand, all facilities need financial suport which is lots of money to develop and expand its range. Although government should invest to builr more museums, people should contribute to organisations especially museums which aggrandize people's education about their ancestors, In addition, museums should have fee and people mabe damage historical items. For instance, in some cases, small group of young children and some people entrered to museum withouth any promission and they collapsed the valuable antique vase and broke. 

On the one hand, some people say that they have right to visit their country's history or science museums. Because, should generate opportunity to people gain knowledge about their major history from museums. For instance, recently, there have built big museum where can contain almost all historical discovery which provide ancient life of and relate to Mongolian the most notable king Chingis khan who could conquer half of mainland of the world. Although my country's civils can know about the most previous historical actions by viciting that museum, people still have not entered it because it has high expence to enter museum.

In conclusion, even though paying cost to for museum has diverse drawbacks like if museum does not  require premission and fee, people can visit to it whenever they want and obtain a range of education about their history, animals and nature by free, it has more superiority and one of them is we can develop museums by investing and paying cost for it. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Junk food advertising has a harmful effect on society and should be banned. To what extend do you agree or disagree. <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'Nowadays people are increasing the past food eat. It has a negative effect on society so people must understand that it is a side effect and that should limited. I totally agree with this and I will discuss it.

On the one hand, fastly these days people are very busy and they are convenient to eat fast food and they do not have to know about that knowledge after there is a side effect. for instance, a company of fast food like pizza, burgers, Coca-Cola, etc. That is an increasing number of people who are convenient to easy for a busy lifestyle. I think the government must give advice to society about how they control it and. They should can limited and they can banned due to more and more side effects of fast food.

On the other hand, secondly, the government should give to knowledge about society. For example ,Like an advertising. Because people are always watching TV they can take knowledge about it. They should given to the program about eating fast food what is the side effects. The main effect is increasing nowadays society majority of people have noncommunicable diseases. Such as cancer, diabetes, pressure, cholesterol, etc. Therefore, always con remember society fast food is convenient to eat but there are more and more bad side effects. This is the way people shout understand and they must be limited to the used it.

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Some believe that students should begin learning a language very early in school while others think these subjects should be taught later.

Discuss both sides and give your own opinion. <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'Learning a language in the early years of school is said to be beneficial to students whilst other people believe that languages should be introduced later on when students have acquired knowledge of other subjects. I am of the view that a language should be one of the first subject to be taught in the early years and to be perfected as the years of learning progresses.

A language can be one of the most difficult subjects that a student could come across as it might be foreign to them. If one does not use that particular language in their day to day, they  will need more time to understand the basics and then get used to it for them to be fluent hence the need to start early on. One can also argue that other subjects like mathematics, history, geography and so many others are usually taught in English in many countries all over the world so there is need to begin with English language amongst other languages so that students can immensely understand all those other subjects.

However, a language can be introduced in the later years of learning. This is so because there is a need to understand basics of learning which is acquired when one fully understands other subjects which are basics like writing and reading. A student will have to learn how to read and write the things they fully understand before being introduced to more complex subjects such as languages.

I could argue that younger the better when it comes to fully grasping the complexity of a language. When the years of learning progresses one will therefore be able to speak, read and write if only they started to learn early. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Some people think that technology is increasing the gap between the rich and the poor. Others argue that the opposite is true. Discuss both these views and give your own opinion. <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'In today's world, technology has become easily accesible for all the individuals. Propenents believe that the rise of global digitization has increased the gap between rich and poor while the opponents argue that it brought people closer to each other. I believe that the latter opinion is true and think that it is one of the things which connects individuals together.

Firstly, many people believe that the rise of new technology like artifical intelligence created a gap between rich and poor. New products such as Apple vision Pro which is a new advanced artifical intelligence tool costs a lot of money and it can be afforded by only rich people. Also, there are many digital applications which are difficult to understand on how to use it and some people think that the illiterates are not better equipped to use the technology. As a result, it has created a huge gap between the two sections of people.

On the other hand, the rise of social media has become a increasingly popular among all the sections of people.For example, facebook and instagram has brought people more closer together which eliminates the gap between rich and poor. Nowadays, almost all the people have access to the internet and they can learn about all the new digital products which are introduced around the world. This helps people from all sections have updated with all the latest new advanced technology.

To sum up, although there are many digital products which can not be afforded by some people, I strongly believe that the rise of technology has brought people more closer together and connected with each other. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> These days more fathers stay at home and take care of their children while mothers go out to work. What could be the reason for this? Is it a positive or negative development? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'Nowadays, mothers go out to work while the fathers prefer to be at home and take care of their juveniles. There can be many reasons of this and people may have varied opinions on the topic. However, my own perspective is uttered as under. The modern era brought a plethora of positive and negative changes that were needed. Although, the reasons for the said happening are not that simple. One of the reasons could be that after giving birth, the women are fed up of their schedule. So in order to have a change in their daily life, they opt for a job and as the baby is needed to be looked after, it is done by the male patent. The other reason may be the wave of feminism that is breaking the patriarchy and consolidating a novel matriarchy. Moving to the positive side, if the fathers are staying at home then the mother is relieved of the daily chores and it is also necessary for their proper recovery from the traumas that they might have experienced during the painful days. Apart from that, it is also beneficial on the global scale as development of a country is judged from the independence enjoyed by the females. Turning to the negative aspect, there might be some conflicts that may arise between the parents because the men are not as gentle as the women in dealing with the children. The prolonged harsh treatment to a child may result in improper growth of a kid. To recapitulate, It could be said that there are many merits of women being at work and fathers staying at home for looking after the children than the demerits. Hence, it could be taken as an appreciable development for the society. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Studies suggest that many teenagers these days prefer socialising online to meeting one another in person.

Why do you think this is the case?

What measures could be taken to encourage teenagers to spend more time meeting one another in person?

Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience. <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'Nowadays, we live in a society who is a step to lost the contact between us. 

From my own  point of view, I think this is happening for the increasing of the time of use in the different devices (like cellphone, tablet, play station, computers, etc) without stablishing a limit of time for them. Also I  think this is happening because many parents avoid spending time with their children because of  work or because they don´t know how to interact with them, so they prefer to give them some devices to maintain them busy, instead of trying to build a relationship, and learn how to communicate and build a bond each other. 

This is a pattern that our parents follow for their parents, than also didn´t know how interact with their children. But of course this is something that is truly important to chance and improve.

Some measures could be taken to encourage teenagers to spend time meeting one another in person:

1. Parents put a schudale to use technoological devices every day.

2. Not give the password of the internet to their children or chance every day/week to avoid during the night their sons

3. Make choose and sign in one outside activities or sport. For example football or swimpool 

4. Spend time in family, doing fun games without use any technoological devices. Like for example, twister, monopoly, etc.

5. During the meals put the rule that is forbidden use technoological devices, so every technoological devices is going to be inside a drawer, only when every one finisth eat, is going to return their cellphones. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Computer and AI technology are increasingly being used for online education. Can artificial intelligence ehance the learning experience? Is this a positive or negative development ? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'Whether learners should use computer specially the Internet is an interesting discussion point. This writer argues that access to valuable resource. 

The main benefit computers bring to learners is access to vast resources. In the other words, learners were once limited to the books they had and the knowledge of their teacher: now they can study about anything they choose at the touch of a button. Taking Google is a prime example because it allows people to easily search for whatever they are looking for quickly and accurately. In the digital age, many people take advantage of using computer to connect far distance to study online without face to face, but study online have beneficial for teacher and pupils, which can expand more understanding. For instance, in Covid 19, people did not allow to go out, so K12 online is an app for teacher and students have an connection to continuous the process of school. 

In this writer’s opinion, the Internet is a very positive development. This is on the grounds that most students will take advantage of the power of the information available to enhance their studies rather than using it to cheat. For example, in 2000, Cambridge University found that students who regularly used a computer for research were 76 per cent more likely to get a first class degree than those who did not. 

Taking all points into account, the possibility of plagiarism is outweighed by easy access to resource and being able to use these resources positively. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Computer and technology are increasingly being used for online education. Can artificial intelligence enhance the learning experience? Is this a positive or negative development? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'Artificial intelligence and modern technology have a high amount of students or tutors use to online learning or teaching. This author believes that learning method is more developing in our lives and has a big drawback of distracting.

It is crucial to understand that AI technology is being consumed more and more due to its convenience. Due to an immense of database and information in the Internet to search and study. Consequently, students will have more way to find knowledge in many websites and apps. For example, Duolingo or YouTube are the most popular apps to check new vocabularies or new knowledge and are up-dated every day, every hour, every minute and even second.

In fact, intelligent robots help our lives a lot but it makes people, provide children and student distract and forget the aim reason why they use modern technology as smart phone, laptop, computer is for learning. The Internet and AI projects have many entertain to amuse so people can easily keep track of and cannot put it down to study immediately. As a result, more and more students have a bad mark because of a night not sleeping with video game on the computer or any artificial intelligence. For example, many parents try to download many apps to control the time their child can access to the Internet and just used for searching data.

Hence, AI good is more improving nowadays in learning due to a huge range of information and its convenience when looking up online but it almost has a negative effect on human, not excepting student’s lives about the distraction when consume it. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Computer and AI technology are increasingly being used for online education. Can artificial intelligent enhace the learning experience? Is this a positive or negative <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'In recent years, technology integration into education has revolutionized how we learn. One of the most significant advancements in this field is the application of Artificial Intelligence (AI) in learning. we have many benifits such as personalize instruction

, provide valuable insights for educators. i believe that it will bring the high level of the learning experience. It is also positive change for the next generation.

 

Nowaday world has many achievements in artificial intelligent, it bring many advantage like 

personalize instruction. it means AI algorithms analyze learner data, including performance, learning style, and progress. Based on this analysis, they tailor content and activities to suit individual requirements from there improve their percentage of understand of lesson. For example, in united kingdom in some schools, principal agreed that paid money for computer or television to make sure that students have abbount lessons. beside that AI can revolutionize teaching methods by providing intelligent feedback, automating administrative tasks, and creating interactive learning experiences.

Adaptive Learning Platforms: AI-powered platforms adapt to students’ pace, strengths, and weaknesses. They adjust content difficulty, pacing, and assessments accordingly.

Thourgh the benifits of AI, i believe that it is the positive way to help following generation have a great quality of eduction in school. the students can think indepent and different ways to slove the prombles, it make them more flexible and confident. If we allow young children use computer during their lesson, they can open mind due to increase the experience of learning.

In conclusion, electronics help both students and teachers to increase the level in education but it will  has some drawbacks if we addict to use them to much. The balance between relax and study need to clearnly to help children improve the skills <END_E>

input:

This can be because that the convenience in keep contract with others in far ways. In my perspective, it is a positive development for education in all over the world. 

   

     There is no doubt that thanks to developing of technology, nowadays, more computers with artificial intelligent are increasing quickly and using more in education. instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Computer and Al technology are increasingly being used for online education. Can artificial intelligence enhance the learning experience? Is this positive or negative development? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'The use of computers and AI technology is growing more and more in education. However, while I recognize that computers are highly useful, I totally think that will benefit from artificial perception in my study.

Artificial skill technology possesses information processing traits similar to the human mind, but the point of difference lies in the computer's ability to accumulate data without omitting any details as well as to acclimatize to new patterns enabling my machine learning, thereby incurring fewer mistakes than a human would. This applies in particular to cases that require dealing with a huge amount of information, which is not always a human strong suit. For example, robots can do housework more quickly and cleanly than humans do.

Despite many great advances, artificial sense technologies are still very far from possessing an algorithm that is capable of replicating human emotions. The best artificial brilliance device can do so far is to mimic basic facial expressions and to voice their concerns. However, this is not different from displaying an error message when there is an obstruction in their pre-programmed. For example, when people are not at home, suddenly strangers break into their house. To solve this problem when they are outgoing are notice to robots of security at home to protect their house and also people living inside.

In conclusion, while computer and Al technology will no doubt improve our learning experiences, the potential risks of such technology should not be ignored. <END_E>
