instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Computers and A.I technology are increasingly being used for online education Can artificial intelligence enhance the learning experience? Is this a positive or negative development? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'In today's digital age, many people are increasingly using A.I technology and computers for online learning, thus leading to enhance the experience of online education. This writer believes that this is a positive development due to creativity improved for student and convenience.

It must be understood that apply online education for children can help them increase their creativity. This is especially so if the children who is during the adolescent because it always possible depending on their lifestyle. Therefore, it allows students to using both social media and internet searching at the same time. Having flexible working means that the experience of them have increased. For example, google meet is a good social media for students to arrive on online meeting class, especially it can be use like online classroom which can allow many students to john online schedule with their service at home.

Another argument worth considering is that A.I technology can make people feel better and faster when they are used from the lesson environment. When working online at home, the student may feel like they can study in their own place, take breaks when needed and enjoy the class with less stress. Consequently, working for long hours is not a problem for student each day, it can have a positive impact on student lifestyle. For instance, according to an article published in BaoThanhNien in 2021, a survey of student who study online from home in Vietnam showed 94% of students said they feel better and convenient when they study online with google meet.

In conclusion, there are more positive elements than negative, as there are clear benefits to student who can study at home, including having a flexible experience. Additionally, the technology should also be improved to enhance the quality of lesson in the future. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Most people accept that we now live in a globalised world but not everyone agrees

that this is beneficial.

To what extent is globalisation a positive or negative development?

Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or

experience. <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'In the context of globalisation, there is a plethora of benefits compared to the past, however, some negative aspects of globalised world is also becoming apparent and is making impact on individual’s lives. In my stance, the world lives in harmony is greatly positive and contributional to society. I will outline my viewpoint and reasons in the essay below.

The most significant basis why globalisation is a positive development for humanity is because it is profitable for the international and national economy. Through the means of technology and trades, products can be exported and consumed widely, creating an active economy climate through which nations can learn from each other. Owing to this trading network, countries across the world can cultivate their own economy by cooperating with other countries, indirectly improving the living condition of the people. For instances, Asian countries export their agricultural products to Western countries, therefore, the farmers can create more consumption market and also promote their own cultures to the foreign.

Another advantageous attribute of globalisation is in the social respect. When many individuals from different regions use the same social platforms such as Facebook, Snapchat and TikTok, knowledge and experience can be disseminated globally and become known by others. Users can exchange their cultural differences and establish bonds with one another. In the big picture, this can promote the beauty of each cultures to international friends and further strengthen the relationships between nations, eradicating discrimination and inequalities.

Granted, there are still some downsides of globalisation that cannot be neglected. One of them are environment pollution. As the economic race is becoming more compeititive between big international corporations, a negative trend arise to benefits their budget which is race-to-the-bottom. This trend exerts adversed effects on the evironment and is gradually destroying the ecosystem. However, the advantages eclipse these disadvantages on the whole, thereby, globalisation is still mainly beneficial to the progress of humanity.

To infer, globalisation does more good than bad. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Some people think that the increasing use of computers and mobile phones in communication has negative effects on young people's      reading and writing skill. To what extent do you agree or disagree? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'In this contemporary world , some people believe's excessive use of computers and smartphones in medium of communication has negative influence on young generation reading and writing skills. I partly agree with the statement , in this essay I will explain in more details.

On one hand , advancement in technology makes  youngesters to become tech bound . With the help of internet ,it become easy to use gadgets and connect to people around the world with their loved ones . For instance, social media networks like face book , instagram and WhatsApp enable the people to talk with their friends and relatives through video call and sharing their knowledge , ideas and notes.Online classes revolutionised the way of learning , no longer students need to go school like traditional classes as then can listen from their comfort zone .

On the other hand, others concern are real , many people are glued to their gadget which adversely affect their analysing , reasoning , reading and writing skill .Futher more it will spoil their creative thinking as well as their mental health . For example many younger generations are addicted to video games through out the day with out and proper food and physical activities. As we can seen people are getting lenses at early age due to excessive use of blue light screens.moreover addiction to the gadgets will kills the social connection outside.

To conclude,as there are numerous advantages of using the computers and mobile phone in this revolutionise world to connect the people. Where as, over use can leads effects to physical and mental growth of young people. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Some people suggest that bringing up children by the whole family including uncles , aunts and grandparents. Do you agree or disagree with this statement? Give your opinion and example. <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'In several regions, it seems to be a challenge for over 50-year-old individuals to seek for appropriate work positions in spite of their noticeable experience. There is a wide range of reasons for this kind of phenomenon as well as a number of solutions to improve the situation. This essay will analyze and discuss such practices along with my own perspectives. 

First and foremost, people who are older than 50 years old typically approach the retirement, which also means that they are hardly able to sign long term contract. For example, the age of superannuation in Vietnam is 55 and 60 regarding to women and men respectively. Therefore, they will have only a few years left until the moment they resign so it will be a waste of time as well as resources in training for them. If they are more than that age, they will be unable to dedicate fully to the companies owning to the lack of flexibility of variable working environments. In addition, the older they become, the more responsibility they have to take on in term of family. Hence, this kind of applicants seems to be incapable of committing thoroughly themselves to the job. 

Second of all, increasing in age level also leads to a plethora of health issues. While younger generation is supposed to be more active and self-motivated to engage in divergent assignments, the former ones depend a lot upon health situation. Seldom do they involve in the night shifts or work overtime. Moreover, they find it extremely challenging to learn innovative technology to keep up with the youth. As a result, participating in a team with other members will then shape them in the prejudice of underwhelmed productivity. This can lead to potential conflict among fellow colleagues in case they are unable to maintain professional integrity under stressful condition. 

Nevertheless, there is a plenty of solutions which can be taken into consideration to address this issue. It has to be based on not only the intervention of the government but also the self-effort of the people who are more than 50 years old. For instance, the authority can modify the current law of salary and bonus regime for experienced people, especially for experts. Furthermore, senior employees who consider themselves to be potentially laid-off ought to stay updated with the novel application of science and technology by taking part in workshops to further improve their value which help remain their current positions. Besides, they should both put more effort into enhancing physical health and balance their personal life versus their career so as to meet the demand of multitasks. I strongly have a thought that with obvious determination, great attempt along with perseverance will finally end up with desired success. 

In conclusion, it is reasonable to comprehend the problem of old people seeking for good jobs, yet there are a number of solutions to solve it as well. It requires a lot of endeavor from both candidates and the interference of the government so that we can enhance the situation. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> First impression is important. Some people think doing well in an interview is key to securing a good job. 

To what extent do you agree or disagree? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'The essential things in an interview are initial attitude and appearance which can lead a better vacancies. In the writer opinion decidedly agree, there are several reasons why it can be advantegous. 

The way of dress is one of the easiest way to determine someone because human is visual oriented. When folks attend a formal event such as job interview, definitedly they are use a pairs of formal uniform to make well impress from the human resources team. Showing a well clothes means respect to the citizens whom meet with. For instance, in 2023 the writer applied internship opportunity from various company, then I got a call by one of them and continue to direct interview. Further, I arrived there, I got compliment because of my perseverance then the interview done smoothly. That is the evidence of how important fashion can affect our vibe. 

How to transfer our knowledge through communication is key of success since words can bring potential gain for everything particularly in job interview. Someone who can explain their capability of work with a well structured incline to get great exposure in workforce. For example, in 2023 the writer explained her capability in data process to applied data scientiest internship position thus not only spoke but also showed the project that was she created before that makes a strong prove of her work. In other words, folk who can deliver their insight efficiently lean a positive feedback sooner or later on job interview results. 

In conclusion, either appearance or communication is a keypoint how to produce an excellent output especially in terms of finding a occupation. Society must take responsibility of this task to suit the clothes depend on the event they come in. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> In many large cities, people waste hours of their time everyday because of traffic congestion on the roads. What are the causes. what solutions can you suggest. <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'It is irrefutable that traffic jam has become a major problem in western socities. Some segments of society strongly argue that masses mostly stuck in the traffic on the roads and waste their precious time in metro cities.This essay intends to cast light on the contributing factors and remedial measures to put a halt to it.Further, I will explicate about this matter in the subsequent paragraphs.

To embark with, a host of reasons can be attributed to this phenomenon. Colossal reason is the worse condition of the roads. To elaborate this, in this cutting-edge, the roads are not accurately maintained. Thus, folks do not drive properly but also bad incidents happens which leads to death. Moreover, inhabitats prefer to use private vehicles. To justify this, in the modern epoch, individuals commute through their own transportation instead of public way of transport. Ultimately, the traffic congestion has been significantly incline. To cite an example, a recent article in a prestigious newspaper highlighted that due to heavy traffic, 85% of workers did not reach at work on time because the citizens faced traffic problem on regular basis.

Nevertheless, as every problem has their own curative measures. Foremost is that, funds should be allocated on maintance for the roads. To substantiate this, the national authorities should spend money on the streets for care or they should construct new bridges or roads for alleviate this issue. Besides this, the car pooling policy should be used by the public. Hence, this would be mitigate major obstacles such as traffic, air pollution etcetra. To exemplify, in 2019, a awareness campaign organized by renowned University in which youth provided awarness regarding car pooling policy which proved helpful.  

To recapitulate, unquestionably, this problem has become a burning question of the day.Therefore, it is not an easy task to solve this. Regimen and society should come forward to diminish this complex issue. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Some people believe that having children leads to happiness. Do you think that people who do not have children can find happiness? What other factors in a person's life affect happiness? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'In  contemporary society, many people believe that having children makes people happiness and joy. However, others assert that there are diverse factors that bring to people happiness without kids. In this essay, I will explain why people who don't have their kids can feel happy and propose diverse ideas in people's lives affect happiness.

There are surely a few reasons why we can live it up without their sons and daughters. First and foremost, a main reason is that they can save a lot of money and they can expenditure their money on hobbies. For example, in Korea, they need a lot of money if they want to raise kids because of education fee, hospital charges, and clothes are expensive. In contrast, if they don't have kids they can learn whatever they want to learn such as sports, and arts, and even they can raise pets. Secondly, another reasonable one is that parents need not  argue about parenting problems for instance different ways of discipline,  education ways, and eating habits. Because, they are raised by different environments  they have diverse ideas when raising kids.

In spite of the above-mentioned content, there are various factors that make their lives happy. Firstly, raising pets such as dogs, cats, and parrots is one of the best ways to spend their time full of humour. For example, sometimes when I go to the park, I can see a dog and my grandmother and at that time, the owner says to me dog is better than the person because the dog obeys owner’s requirements. Moreover, sometimes their residence makes people happy and comfortable. For example, in my case, whenever I return to my flat after my daily routine, I feel comfortable and thrilled.

To sum it up, considering all the previously mentioned information even though having children has positive effects on theirs lives, however, I believe that we can fulfil our life happy with other ways. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> It is said that music is important for bringing people together from different cultures and ages. Do you agree or disagree? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'Music is  a miracle .it is common language of the  people of the world that human can connect together through its .I think, exactly melody can create condition that  race ,  appearance and color  are unimportant jute they want  enjoyable the tone .Music is ancestors heritage that we can use musical for  different subject such as, it can apply treatment of depression ,dancing , you can be a mentor music and learn it to men ,it can use in different ceremony while you choose your ton according to rite , you can learn instrument and play it and create wonderful music even you can exploit  the most growing plant or for a person can sleep better . It has a lot of applications and different styles such as classic ,pop , local , rock … that they choose style according to their manner .

Exactly if you choose your tact for example pop music  you can know  a group of people that they love  pop music even  if  you  don’t have similar nationality , languages ,religions or mindset you can connect through  music .  really, it is an  amazing  feeling that  I can't describe .When you go to concert every moment you feel  The whole crowd became one  and Everyone sings together with the music  it create correlation among  the people  .

Incredibly music is strong bridge of communication between  people  without non compulsory that the cause of  this cohesion is  love to it .so it is the best cause that people want gather to gatherer and they have had enjoyable time  . I recommend , everyone  learn an instrument and find own style for  better communication. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> is learning english more important than local languanges? give your opinion. <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'There is a noticable variance regarding the focus on language studying. The acquisition of english language skills are more pivotal than that of local languages. In this essay, I will discuss both scenarios and explain why I consider both are equily significant,

English has been occupied the top spot of most spoken language, without certain extent of ability to speak english, it is in fact relatively difficult to reach higher level of achievement in my opinion. Meanwhile, lacking english skills can also results in reduction of opportunity, because almost every apsect in this society, being able to communicate in english is a huge bonus point, sometimes even being an unskippable requirement. Thus, if individuals do not have adequate skills of english, they will face challenges, such as rejections from universities and companies they have always aspired to get into.

On the other hand, it is also crucial to learn local languages, as they contain the culture and history meaning behind it. Simultaneously, language is also one of th building blocks of its culture characteristic. If individuals tend to soley focus on studying english for a better opportunity to connect to other parts of the world, the discrepancy between every unique culture and language itself are possible to diminsih ultimately. Therefore, some measures should be executed. To provide an example, local languages courses are mandatory here in Taiwanese educational settings. In addition, from the beginning of one's school life, you have to study Madarin thoroughly, even the literature works and cultural value it contains. 

In conclusion. I acknowlege how crucial it is to have the ability to commuciate in English in this globalizing era, preserving and recognizing the value that local languages possess are also essential. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> As a result of electronic inventions such as the computer and television, people do less physical activity, and this is having a negative effect on their health.   To what extent do you agree or disagree ? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'There has been arguing over technical development's advantages or not. I absolutely agree that this problem is harmful to our health. Advocates contend that inventions like the computer and television would be more helpful for making our lives more efficient and easygoing. They believe that technology development will be our alternative option in the future. Hence, these gadgets give us ways to improve our health, like using apps. For example, we can use the apps to calculate our heart rate. Moreover, some apps would be useful when we face emergency situations by calling the police or hospital. 

However, working out our bodies is a crucial factor in maintaining our health. Sweating from our bodies can give us more energy and relieve our stress from the workplace. Since our body is not a machine, we should keep it moving and get adequate rest. Adolescents, including children, should exercise more than adults. Because they have been growing bodies, it is not good that their addiction to state-of-the-art technology leads them to have fewer communication skills. There has been research that shows that addicted children lack conception and efficiency in problem solving. 

In conclusion, from my perspective, I truly believe that excessive use of computers and television might be harmful for us if they are overused. I would like to say that a healthy body goes along with good mental health. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Animal testing has a positive impact on scientific research, but it can have a negative effect on animals and lead to financial waste. 

Discuss the advantages and disadvantages of animal experimentation. <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'Some argue that experimentation on animals have a lot of advantages such as the development of science while others contend that those testing have many disadvantages with the consequences of financial waste and more. There are both merits and demerits, and I think the drawbacks are greater than the benefits. 

On the one hand, there are several benefits of animal testing. First of all, animal testing is playing an increasingly important role in the field of medical industry. When researchers who majored in medical area find out new medicines of diseases, it has to be checked and tested. By using animals for testing, they can get various results such as side effects, validations and more, leading to the improvement of not only medical field but also human life. In addition, it is inevitable to use animals for testing instead of people. When scientists want to do test of their findings, it is hard for them to find individuals who want to participate in the experiment and it costs a lot. However, if they use animals, it is easy to find and spends much less. Therefore, there is no choice for them to use animal species for a test. 

On the other hand, I firmly believe that the drawbacks outweighs the benefits, and there are some reasons of experimentation on animals. Firstly, the awareness of animal rights can be decreased. If people deem animals solely as a means of testing, animal’s rights will be disappeared gradually. Human and animals must coexist together on earth, so people should preserve animal species, respecting their values. Moreover, experimentation on animals can exert a negative influence on human life. If researchers or scientists keep doing a test with animals, it will lead to the reduction of animal species. It is undeniable that animals play a crucial role in nature. Protecting animals is one of the effective solutions for preserving the natural environment, so it is imperative for individuals and society to stop animal testing. 

In conclusion, it is obvious that experimentation on animals is beneficial for the development of various fields. Nevertheless, people should protect and respect animals due to the responsibility, leading to the improvement of human life and the environment eventually. Therefore, governments or authorities worldwide should come into force a law associated with animal testing. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> In some schools and universities, girls tend to choose art subjects (e.g. literature), and boys tend to choose science subjects (e.g. physics). Why do you think this is so? Should this tendency be changed? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'It is a fact that female students are more inclined towards the arts namely languages while boys get allured by the sciences such as physics. As per my viewpoint it is the case in majority of subject choices due to societal pressures. However, this has to be changed in the future.

To begin with, interplay of society and family roles play a big role in the decison for careers. Women usually find that they have to play the role of a mother and educate their children and also they are required to pay more attention to the household chores. Hence, arts seems to be less challenging and it has less job prospects. The families preach this ideology that they have to take dual responsibilities so they try to minimize their career impact from the beginning. However, in the case of men, it is thought that they might make their career better in the engineering field by taking physics and they can excel in such subjects due to minimal pressure from parents to participate in household responsibilities. Thus, this might be the reason for such decisions to opt the professions.

On the contrary, it should be changed. The contenders argue that this has detrimental effect on the society as a whole. A female is a would be mother that is the first teacher of her offsprings. If she does  not has any knowledge about science then how will she impart this to her kids? For example, some studies suggest that upbringing is the most the important step in the development of intersts in certain subjects which will determine the subjects children takes in the future.

To conclude, it is widely witnessed that gender biases are practiced to decide careers among people. However, this needs to reformed by awareness because it can lead to an unequal society. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> More and more people are using mobile phones and the internet to communicate. Therefore, people are losing their ability to communicate face to face. To what extent do you agree or disagree? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'In this contemporary world, mobile phones have become integral part of lifestyle. People are using it for communication purposes. Some people believe that due to these devices, individuals are not confortable in face to face conversations. Although, I agree that the modern technology has changed the way of communication but they are not the only reason behind less physical interaction. 

   To commence with, technology was developed to make lives easier and it is doing do.  Nowadays, with the help on telephones and internet, a person can talk to his friend or relative sitting in another country, however, it was not possible in 20th century. It not only helped to reduce the distance but also helped to make relationship stronger. Nevertheless, I agree that people are more busy on phones, whether in scrolling instagram, watching movies or other stuff like that, but the culprit behind this not phone, it's the individual who is using it.  He should reduce the time he usually spend on these gadgets, so that he can enjoy more with his family.

    Moving further, another cause of less interaction is busy life.  There is big race going on in outside world and everyone wants to win it. Therefore, no one has leisure time for his love ones. For instance, students are working hard to achieve good grades so that the can get better job and earn more. Same is in the case of elder folks. They are running behind making more money and getting successful and because of all this, they are leaving behind their relationships.

  To conclude, yes, at some extent mobile phones are the cause of less face to face communication but it also depends on the person how he use it. He should reduce its usage and try to interact with others physically. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Some people think that money is one of the most essential factors in promoting happiness.

Do you think people can be happy without much money <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'Money is considered by people to be one of the most contributing factors towards happiness. In my opinion people can be happy even if they have a little money, there are a variaty of things lead to happiness such as being healthy and have a family.  If we want to be happy,  we can feel every aspects of life.

Mongolian say that health is the most important thing in their life and healthy person can earn money, learn scientifics as well as feel happy. We should study to praise a little thing in my life being healthy, being alive etc. These simple things make people to be happy.  On the other words happiness is to be our insight. A majority of people seek for happiness outside from money, others, drugs but i never heard about  these people find true happiness. 

Another source of happiness is loving and caring family. This gives us how you are important and precious  in your family. When we  touch each other take for example kiss, hugg our brain releases dopamin that named horman of happiness. Dopamin helps to streght our immune of psychology, make people more positive and reduce stress.  Many people beleive that family is more valuable thing than money. In addition, if someone give us the choice to  whether money or family, every people choose their family without any hesitate. 

To conclude, money gives some people happiness but there are many vital source of happiness in the world. Many people can feel happiness from being healthy, have a good family. That means happiness hide inside human. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> You should spend about 40 minutes on this task. Write about the following topic: insane tisson or tone or but ang they ming interested in finding What are the reasons for this? How can people research this? Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience. Write at least 250 words. <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'Regardless of where you live, what you do, it is extremely important to understand the environment that surrounds you, including the people you lived around, the community you stayed, and the building you inhabited. People nowadays creates the interest in understanding their own house, and I find it absolutely worth it! Also it strengthens the bond between one and another. 

When it comes to relationships, it is always a two-way interaction. To feel a sense of belonging, it is required to put some efforts towards the others, for instance, I always show kindness at first wherever I would like to cultivate a new relationship.

Also, history always gets us reflect on ourselves. In my personal experience, the stories behind allows me to show gratefulness. I am thankful that not only I get to inherit this long lived building, but also

the opportunity of hearing all the happenings and the wisdom within it .

There are several ways to collect these information, I usually visit the neighborhoods, afterall they know the most of this area, I also use google map to see if they kept the data that I could take a look at the buildings back at the days. It is always better to see in your own. I would pay a visit to the city library and seek for government records.

It is crucial to always have the passion understand your surroundings, It not merely just provide you with more knowledge, but you can be more involved in the communey as well as cultivate deeper relationships, and generates gratitude with the ownership for the present. It is recommended to ask the locals for more informal contents. Moreover, internet povides digital image and the city library would store formal data. Please make sure to spend some time to understand, you might disclose some of the mystery. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> In some of countries, the average weight of people is increasing, and their fitness levels are decreasing. What do you think are the causes of these problems and what measures could be taken to solve them? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'In recent years, there has been a high increase of health issues among populations around the world. Overweight and obesity are some of the major concerns affecting the overal fitness of the majority. In this essay, i will discuss the causes of these issues and provide solutions that can be used to address them.

The number of people suffering from over-weight is increasing everyday. Firstly, there is too much production of genetically modified food. This is one of thew biggest problems affecting weight management. The chemicals used in these products are dangerous to the body and they help acumulate excess fat in the body. For instance, they are injecting chemichals that speed growth of poltry to mature in a few weeks, when people consume meat from these animals they also get affected, Additionally, communities are eating a lot of junk food, these are foods like burgers, chips and kentaky. These foods contain high colesterol and it affect the diggestive system hence failure to regulate body fats. Moreso, diseases such as diabetes are also the cause of these body weight issues. diabestes cause a number of health problems that impairs the body's ability to stay fit

Nevertheless, there are many ways to tackle these problems. One; folks must resort to eating organic foods rather than GMOs, this will helps to maintain the body's homeostasis. Secondly, people should be consious about their diet, people should normalise eating vegetable and fruits. There is an english adegy that says \ <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> A government has a responsbility to its citizens to ensure their safety. Therefore, some poeple think that the government should increase spending on defense but spend less on social benefits. To what extent do you agree ? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'There is an ongoing debate about whether governments ought to prevent their population due to their responsibility by reducing social activities in public. Therefore, some people advocate that they do not have to lessen leisure activities in public in order to protect the crowd, yet others are no of strong belief about that matter. This essay strongly agrees with the opinion and considers that lessening activities is necessary to conserve people.

On the one hand, plenty of issues in crowded places can be observed due to density of individuals. Which are namely infection, and disorders. In other words, administrations must restrict motion of humans in public in order to reduce viruses infecting over the air. For instance, proportion of illnes people was decreased by strict rules during the Corona-19 epidemic. Hence, carrying out limits in locals is significant so as to prevent public from diseases.

Neverthless, in contemporary times, a myriad of countries  have struggled with terrorism issues. In addition, terrorists aim crowded places in order to properly implement their duties so a multitude of instructions, including prohibiting exhibitions or concerts, are being taken in order to guarantee population's life. For example, in 2017, a bomb attack in Turkey did not lead to huge issues since the governement had already applied ways preventing public. Thus, amending activities, such as concerts and festivals is fundamental to conserve crowd.

In conclusion, restriction individuals' motions might firstly seem like a detrimental fact, yet it is extremely beneficial for public. The essay strongly believes that administrations must ban some activites in order to conserve their population. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Schools should focus on academic success and passing examinations. Skills such as cookery, dressmaking and woodwork should not be taught at school as it is better to learn these from family and friends. To that extent do you agree or disagree. <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'In modern world, often appears a though about the indispensable skills required in schools.The big amount of people suppose that academic education is more important than cookery, dressmaking and woodwork. Due to children can learn this at home. I totally disagree with this statement. Indeed, the academic schooling is what opens the doors to different universities and helps to achieve goals and dreams, we should not forget about the clout of household proficiency, which the majority use every day.

Firstly, the knowledge of the basic practical skills is simply essential. It helps not only in everyday life, but it also gives an opportunity for students to chose their own path in the future. Only by learning such dexterity, kids are able to make a decision, either way they would like to become a cook, carpenter or to have completely contrasting career. Of course, it doesn't guarantee that everyone will decide instantly, but it will definitely simplify the

pick.

Secondly, is that not all of the students came from skilled worker's families. For example, some of the parents are from professional area. As a result, they probably don't have enough time or ability to teach their kids skills such as cookery, dressmaking and woodwork. That is why it is extremely important to have such lessons at school, which can close the gaps in education. 

To conclude, academies must include such lessons into their program, due to the necessity of this fineness in livelihood and help in profession choice in the near future. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Learning English at school is often seen as more important than learning local languages. If these are not taught, many are at risk of dying out. In your opinion, is it important for everyone to learn English? Should we try to ensave the survival of local languages and if so, how? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'English become the worldwide language in modern world. In all over the world, people speaks the English language. Moreover, English in schools often see teach to students rather their native language but if students not learned their mother tongs it can dying out. In my point of view, native languages should give preference in school by organizing the competition events and writting the slogans on walls.

To commence with first view, English is vital to teach in school because it is the main language of most developed nation. If students learn English in early ages, they can go abroad for study and face less difficulties in language barriers and they have more opperunities in different sectors. For example, a survey shows by CBC 75 percent people are English language speaker. Hence, learn english language makes easy to survive in developed countries.

Moving towards my opinion, school needs to organize competition and writes the slogan on walls for survival of nation language. Firstly, schools need to create interest to speak native language and needs to organize competition on school level, state level and nation level and give some prize on winning.This will create the interest in students to learn more about local language. Moreover, schools and government need to write. The slogan on school walls in native language so students can read when they see and government need to put sign board in thier local language so it will not diminish. For instance, Kerala start putting the raid and village name sign in local language along with English. Therefore, competition enhance the interest in students and slogan helps to preserve the native languages. 

To conclude, learning a English is not bag because it is worldwide language but school and government to take necessary step to preserve the native languages by creating the interest in students as well as writting on the walls. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Some people think it is a better way to go abroad to work or study, while others think staying in their own country is a better choice. Discuss both views and give your own opinion <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'In the modern world, nowadays many countries have problems with a lack of workers, which results in some  people believe that when go aboard to work or study is better than their own country. Whereas many people argue that living in mother country is a better decision. In my opinion, I strongly believe that going abroad is better for improving yourself.

There are many reasons to go abroad, firstly, In the developed country have many opportunities for working than undeveloped country. For example, The salary is higher than the undeveloped country and working hours is less than 8 hours. Money is the main reason for their decision.

Secondly, It is undeniable that education is one of the reasons for decided moving their live to another country, because education system of developed country have quality more than mother country. Moreover, the others reasons is comunicatin by english language, due to in recent day english comunication is play a crucial roles for many w, when they concern about conversation that environment is important for improve their skills.       

In contrast, some people suggests that living in their own countries is better for living other countries.

There are safe zone for living, they have intimate thier family. Furthermore the environment of living is the importance point for concern, because when people  go abroad they must changing a lot of routine activities such as food, place, or relations between people. 

To conclude, there are 2 main key point between going abroad and staying in own country. In my opinion, I think going abroad is better way for enhance our abilities such as language, working experience or study. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> New technologies and ways of buying and selling are transforming the lives of consumers.

what extent do you agree or disagree with this opinion? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'Nowadays, there are many new information technologies and many different payment methods. Around us, there are many people using it. I completely agree with the idea that this will change users' lives

First, the development of information technology is a good thing. Scientists have invented many new inventions so that people can connect with each other in every country. This is very convenient, it helps people easily communicate with each other through many software. For example, users can contact via Facebook zalo,... to call relatives. Therefore it brings many benefits and trust to users

On the other hand, users will depend on it to easily pay for the items they have purchased. This is very convenient and easier to use than using an automatic teller network. They will no longer have to pay in cash, but besides that, they use the money transfer method. In particular, QR codes are now popular in every store, making it easier for buyers to use. Therefore, the number of buyers choosing this method is increasing

In conclusion , this is extremely convenient and easy to use but it still has some negative effects  However this new technology will definitely change the lives of consumers. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Some people believe that the best way of learning about life is by listening to the advice of family and friends. Other people believe that the best way of learning about life is through personal experience. Compare the advantages of these two different ways of learning about life. Which do you think is preferable? Use specific examples to support your preference <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'Beyond doubt, there have been many discussions revolving around the issue of whether some groups support the belief that people should be receive advice from their family and friends for learning or others agree that people ought to learn by themselves. Although both ideas are respectful, I highly support the second idea. In the next paragraph, I will delve into the main reasons in their detail.

First of all, parents have precious advices because they experience a lot of things due to their age in the life. Therefore, most of them usually can try to guide their children in the right direction. Besides, friends are also very close ones for us. For this reason, they usually help to us that we make the right decisions. For example, any person wants to attempt to a new business. If their family or friends have some pieces of information about it, their recommendations will be very valuable. Moreover, people will be prevented their loss of time or money by them. All these are taken into consideration, it seems that listening to the advice of family and friends is very plausible. 

On the other hand, this belief that who learns about anything by yourself is very important because if people learn by themselves, it can occur some mistakes. Consequently, people can learn well through these mistakes in the next time. Furthermore, the learning process can change for any person. Sometimes learning anything can be easy for one person, however another one can feel some difficulties. It does not mean that it is difficult in general. What’s more, young people especially are more aware of innovations compared to their family. Thereby, learning sometimes can change to situations.

To sum up, I support people should learn from their personal experiences because they can learn very well from their noticed rights and mistakes. Hence, they will improve with their experiences. In my opinion, people should listen to the advice of their family and friends when they have need it. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Some people say that noise made by people should be strictly controlled while others say they should be free to make noise without limitation. Discuss both views and give your own opinion. <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'Both texts complement each other, describing pressing issue of teenagers' unwillingness to study PE. While the second text considers the fundamental reasons for this, the first one offers some solutions and the benefits they can provide.

   The consequences of lack of physical activity are on the surface, but what are they causes by? Firstly, not only teenagers became less crazy about it, but nowadays there is also a significant problem of genders, which leads to girls refusing to share PE classes with boys. Especially, this problem is essential in a high school. Secondly, thereare not so many sports in schools offered to find the one which appeals to you. Last but not least, PE uniform is absolutely old-fashionable. Teens now prefer to be in trend, but this bizzare clothe just crosses this opportunity.

   Is there any alternative way of teaching sports in schools? Fortunately, there is - and the first text focuses onit. The NAtional Sports Academy provides courses which help teachers to find the most effective vector of  PE development. It makes coaches familiar with best exercises to keep fit. It is also worth bearing in mind that such practice will decrease the amount of Neurological diseases. Equally importantly, spirit of competition will born in schools which is really good for everyone, as trying to beat all the records is good for character.

 As a recent graduate, I can say that all the problems emphasised in these texts are definitely not a joke. The world is changing rapidly, so why should PE lessons stay the same? I hope this idea is clear for government and they will \u003cпредпринять меры\u003e to improve the situation. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Some parents buy their children a large number of toys to play with.

What are theadvantages and disadvantages for the child having a large number of toys? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'Some adults are buy their offsprings a large amount of toys, this essay will uncover the advantages and disadvantages of the given notion. 

It is obvious that children are happy when they received toys from their parents. Nevertheless having many types of playing tools might isolated an individual by not willing to play outside with their peers especially for only child. For example, a parents who spoiled their child by giving him Playstation, Pump it Up and various type of game gadgets at home tend to indulge in their own world, because of poor time management, lack of self awareness and dicipline. Consequently, this kid might disobey their parents, neglecting their homeworks and resist to socialize outside home with his friends.  

Having a various types of toys could be beneficial for children only if parents choose it wisely what type of toys that might help them to learn more and boost their academic scores at school and by minimalize the amount if it. For example, in this modern era, physical toys are rare especially for kids who already enters the elementary school. Large number of games are installed in a gadget named Ipad which can easily be brought anywhere. not only games, youtube and learning apps can be installed. thus, will avoid youngsters from isolated their mind in games and devided their interest in another apps like youtube and Duolingo for learning or even socializing with their friends in social media. 

To sum up, owing to lack of self awareness, poor time management and dicipline in kids, giving them a large number of toys will cause various problems such as isolation, disobidient and more. Furthermore, simplify their pleasure and needs in just one gadget such as Ipad could be more beneficial by devided their interest in apps. However, In order to expand a gadget benefits and decrease risks and negativity, parental  supervision is needed. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> You should spend about 40 minutes on this task.

Some people say that the experiences a child has before starting school have the most influence on their future life. Others say that experiences as a teenager, especially at school, are more influential. Discuss both views and give your own opinion?

You should write at least 250 words. <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'The majority of people believe that pupils a improve their future lives most successfully before starting school. Other ones say that improvement as a teenager, for at school, is more strong. In this essay, I will discuss both views and I give you my own opinion.

On the one hand, the majority of people have family background is the main point for pupils' strong attitude toward their parents and siblings.they are always flowing about what they see and what they hear. therefore, parents have a the responsibility that their children have. They should teach them good thoughts and attitudes. For example,  parents should keep always they are attitudes like good communication and respect for each other. As a result, pupils follow what they see and they do it. The reason why, pupils always future life become successful in their home before starting school.

On the other hand, while others believe that children learn for their future life success the school for teenagers.  Moreover, they think that the tuter gives them good knowledge and attitude for school. For instance, they are taking some of the other knowledge in the school for teenagers. Such as the tuter gives them on-time work and a good attitude like cleaning their background in the classroom also outside of the the class. However, that way children should take other knowledge from the school too. As a consequence, they get the knowledge of their future life they work on time and they have to keep good discipline.

In conclusion, more and more children have an attitude that their future life is successful for their families before going to school. Another way that they make good improvements is that school too. In my opinion, that way children make a good improvement on both side and children should follow that they future is well <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> low cost airline let people travel around the world. Some say it is positive, other say it is negative. Discuss both views and give your own opinion <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'In this day and age, noone can deny that our demand in term of traveling is one of natural demand of human and the evolution of low-cost airlines accommodate and let people with travel around the world more easier. Someone believe that the advantages of this innovation while the others prefer to think that low-cost airlines bring about lots of damaging effects.It is important to admit that both views have their own benefits. In this essay, I will discuss the possible reasons that support each view and what benefits they bring to the society.

On the one hand, the option to think that the pros of cheap airlines has its benefits for many convincing reasons. Most importantly, one positive of this development is the increased of travel in all walks of lives. For example, in the past traveling by air was mainly reserved for rich people, however, low-cost airlines offer more reasonable price for airing travel to go on vacation domestically or to foreign countries. Furthermore, it is also important to mention that it contributes more income for the tourism industry and globalization process. For instance, in Thailand where the government focuses a lot on the tourism industry, flights are considered to be cheaper as compared to other countries lead to more and more traveller come here and this is an attempt to attract tourists easily and boost the country's economy.

In spite of that, I contend that low-cost airlines are a negative growth. One of the drawback of cheap airlines expansion is the a release of carbon emission which released from using fossil fuels ( coal, gas, petro…). Consequently, if there are numerous of people travel by planes because of the cheaper price, the gas emission will be pile up in the atmosphere and destroy the earth’s ozone layer. Additionally, this is one of the most reasons responsible for greenhouse gas and global warming. Another key reason is the low-cost airplanes is the main reason that bring about economic slowdown in other types of transportation. Cheap airplane bring to user the most service in everything ( saving time, better service,….) while the others can’t do that. For instance, low-cost airplanes can take you 10 times faster than a ship or a train do while the tickets get a similar price or it’s service will be better than the others transportation many times. 

In conclusion, a cheap plane ticket has its benefits and drawbacks. Even though low-cost airline has its positive effect but it just the immediate benefits and natural and ourself have to suffer many consequences later, i believe that there are more negative impact of low-cost airlines so we need to gì đó con kbiet viết gì nữaaaaaaa <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Many offices authorities impose a restriction on smoking within the office premises. Some governments have even banned smoking in all public places. This is a good idea but it takes away some of our freedom. 

Do you agree or disagree that this is the right of course. Give reason for your opinion. <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'The restriction or banning of smoking not also in the offices or in their surroundings are imply for many companies. Additionally, Goverment has been acting strongly towards this issue and prohibiting the use of cigarettes in public spaces. Wether other people believe it is taking away our free will, i think is good for everyone, so im strongly agree with this initiative.

Firstly, smoking is a detrimental habit for our health, although it is not a issue only with smoker, it is also for others who does not practice this horrible practice. Moreover, scientifically it is related with deeper problems in our system. For instance, changing the morphology of lung tissues leading up to a lung cancer also cholesterol and triglycerides increased as a result of cardiovascular diseases just like the main causes of smoking.

From my perspective, it is beneficial to address this matter making rules to keep save or keep away the healthy population who are against of this bad habit. Moreover, it is beneficial for the country because the health system will not be collapse if they are having more unhealthy people in their premises or giving long lasting treatments who in their moment has the opportunity to choose a right desicion.

To sum up, smoking yes, it is an personal choice however, it can affects others. In addition can be a long term problem in the health care sector where can have to maintain those people, not only with medicines or treatment but also in hospitals as a consequence deteriorating the health system. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> The gap between the rich and the poor has been enlarged in recent years. 

What are the causes and solutions for this problem? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'There is a growing distinction between wealthy and less successful people recently. This essay will first discuss corrupted government officials who causes the problem, and the best solutions is to announce capital punishment or life sentence for any case of illegal actions among authorities.

In most cases, corruption is an essential reason why people experience poverty.  Some  dishonest government officials give more chances to wealthy men than destitute people. Furthermore, political leaders prone to provide businesspeople with various subsidies to run their business without any conditions or in case of getting a bribe in comparison with other less affluent entrepreneurs. Consequently, rich people are becoming richer and richer due to their various possibilities, meanwhile almost 70% of the total population live under the lowest level of standard of living.

The solution is how corruption can be eliminated in country is implementing custodial strict laws by arresting guilty people till the rest of their life or executing them. When any government representative is suspicious of being offered corrupted actions, responsible officers must take pro-active approaches to prove and punish that disloyal state worker. After this person should be send to jail as a life sentenced convicted or even get death penalty. For example, Singapore ministers were able to eradicate totally any misconduct action in the just in 40-year time to become a fair country.

In conclusion, the gap between solvent and middle -lass population is negatively growing. Corruption is the main cause, however, some strict laws that limit somebodies’ freedom can help to reduce it. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> ome children spend hours every day on their smartphones.

Why is this the case? Do you think this is a positive or a negative development? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'In this contemporary era, with the advancement of techology and globalization, the use of modern technological devices has rapidly increased. Many tend to spend most of the precious time virtually on modern devices. This essay outlines the negative development examining the reasons and potential consequences.

Firstly, the development of cellular phones postively impacted our community in different ways. By examining the method of communication between the past generations this method has proliferated the company to provide and upgrade their devices. People from anywhere in the part of the world can communicate virtually. For example, applications like whatsapp, instagram and skype plays a prominent role in this generation. Another reason, nowadays a great number of kids own their own smartphones mainly to communicate with their group of friends. Cellular phones has become an inseparable device in adoloscents lives. For instance, pupil use it for watching movies, playing video games and also reading e-commerce books through Amazon prime which grab their attention in to thier phones.

From my perspective, this development has varuious drawbacks. First and foremost, it is extremely time consuming as children find themselves scrolling down for hours rather than focusing on extracurricular activities or playing outdoor games with their counterparts. With the excessive use, people can become isolated and finds difficulty in communicating in academic or even with neighbourhoods. For example, if a child only speaks to his friends by texting, he would not be able to express is ideas in face to face interactions, which will make him depressed and anxious.

In short, although the growth of modern technology has impacted the world in variable ways, it can damage the childrens brain to think and vision with the over usage even in their growing stage. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> In many countries, people are consuming more sugar-based drinks that ever before. Why is this happening? What chould be done to reduce sugary drink consumption? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'The trend to drink sugar-based products has rose in the past few years. One of salient reason behind this trend is the rising proportion of stressful events across the worlds. However, it can be tackled with the firm actions from governments, which will be discussed in this essay. 

The primary reason for this phenomena is the high prevalence of stressful events. It can be seen that several phenomena in this world lately has caused remarkable and detrimental impacts in society, such as the climate change and world war, which later intrigue them to experience psychological difficulties, mainly stress. Retrieved from Statista this month, the data reveals that there are 89% people globally who currently suffer from trauma and stress, prompting action to seek for coping strategies, such as travelling or consuming things that can help people to ease their feelings, and one of those is the consumption of sugar-based drink products. The extended study show, that since the beginning of climate change and Ukraine war in 2021, the proportion of people who consumed sugar-based drink has soared to 54% globally that has been indicated from the surging purchasement of several renowned products such as Coca Cola or Starbucks. Those people believe that the regular consumption of those products can significantly make them happier and less worried about future, as nowadays people likely to feel uncertain about it due to the world’s unstable conditions. As a result, the prevalence from this condition can heighten the likelihood to suffer from some diseases such as diabetes or stroke; therefore the authorities are deemed to take actions. 

In order to reduce the intake of sugar-based drinks, governments can start conduct some actions. First, increasing the price of sugar-based beverages. By rising the price, people will less likely to buy the product, since they it prompts a particular thought that people will waste their money. This radical solution has seen effective among Japanese citizens since their municipalities decide to culminate the price of sugar beverages in every restaurants and retailers by $2 until $5, eventually driving people to drink water instead. Second, subsidise a healthier drink option to substitute sugar-based drinks. For example, it can be seen in some Singapore streets where locals or tourists can easily find the fresh juice maker machine as part of the local government endeavours to reduce the percentage of people who suffer from diabetes due to their regular consumption of sugar-based drinks. From those solutions, it can be said that some firm actions by governments can effectively lower the proportion of people who consume sugar-based products. 

In conclusion, the high number of sugar-based drink consumers is notably intrigued by the peak number of stressful events that currently happen across the world, as they begin to see that habit as one of effective coping strategies. To reduce that number; therefore, local municipalities can start to take actions such as increasing the price of sugary products and allocate more funds to a healthier beverage option in order to substitute the sugary products. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Write about the following topic:

Some university students want to learn about other subjects in addition to their main subjects. Others belleve it is more important to give all their time and attention to studying for a qualification.

Discuss both these views and give your own opinion.

Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience.

Write at least 250 words. <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'The two views have their own benefits and shortcomings. It is clear that we all have the same amount of time in a day, and the time amount that one decided to devote into a specific topic could much determine how professional they would become. As a consequence, if you invest all the time into one category, there is no doubt you will exceed most of the other, but it also means that you can only experts in the one and only topic. While on the other perspective, which we allocate our time into few subjects, there are less chance to become elites in any category, yet you can obtain knowledges from each criteria. 

   In my personal opinion, I would prefer the latter, and here are some further explanations below. First, I agree it is totally worth it to contribute all one’s time to master one technique when you are certain that this is the one and only subject you would choose throughout your life. However, speaking in general, this is not most of the case was. Take myself as an example, I majored in marketing, while I want to attend a different major for my master. The main reason, it is not competitive enough if you only understand in one field. Nowadays, most jobs require knowledges from more than one subjects. Even if you aren’t professional in any subjects, obtaining more than one subjects of knowhow could create boundaries for your own that others couldn’t cross and therefore, create competitiveness among peers. 

   The word“slash life” is a lifestyle refers to one have several jobs in the same time, in other words, they earn incomes from few places, and likely from some similar but also different area. The concept of having identities in career wide, could explain that people are expecting diversified professional skills for adapting to the world. 

   To quickly sum up, It is fine if you spread your professions into different categories, but it is extremely crucial to integrate them for you to standout from others. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> With the rise in popularity of the internet, newspapers will soon become a thing of the past.

To what extent do you agree or disagree? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'In last few decades, as a high technology century people tend to surf the internet and get news on their devices, as a result, newspaper becoming the thing called old school. I completely agree with this statement and elaborate on this essay.

On the one hand, new technologies massively changed the speed of news delivery. The invention of television and radio prepared humanity for the upcoming news revolution. Before the 19th century, newspapers were crucial for people. Newspapers, letters and rumours were the only source of information back then. In the 20th century with the help of radio and television, it became possible to hear news upon request right from home at any time of the day.  

To be more specific, the invention of the internet was a real game changer. Soon after the internet, new devices with direct internet connection became reachable and affordable to everyone.Today, a huge percentage of people have personal mobile phones or laptops. Thus, starting from this moment, everyone obtained a chance to create and read content from all possible places on Earth. In addition, it gave an opportunity to create articles and video reviews and share them through the internet at any time and any place. Furthermore, new applications and streaming platforms prove that revolutionary change. More applications for mobile devices appear every day and streaming platforms create more interesting formats for content consumers. 

In conclusion, newspapers has become old school source of information. Therefore, new technology changed the methods of data and content delivery. These techniques have become more easy and suitable for people and the internet today is the main source of information. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> In many countries, the level of crime is increasing and crimes are becoming more violent.

Why do you think this is and what can be done about it? <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'In the contemporary epoch, the rate of crime is observed to be skyrocketing in various nations around the globe. Unemployment and corrupt government officials are the major causes of the significant rise in the crime ratio. It is necessary to make humans aware and make strict regulations for the rulers of the country to protect the economy. 

To begin with, the most predominant extrapolation behind the excessive crime rate is unemployment in most nations. For instance, as per the reports of 2018, approximately 6.7% of the Indian population was living below the poverty line and this situation has been exacerbated in 2019, and 2020. If individuals are not able to earn enough for their living to fulfill their necessities due to the dearth of resources, they usually choose the wrong trajectory and end up becoming criminals. Hence, the lack of jobs is a primary reason that boosts criminal percentage. Another pivotal reason is the presence of some corrupt government leaders in the nation. There are some executives, who only care about money and they do not care for the well-being of their public, and they use black money to promote corrupt practices in the economy to maintain their power. Due to such cases, administration staff members who are already rich are earning well and the poor are suffering relentlessly and get involved in the line of criminals for their family needs.

It is enormously vital that an equal chance should be provided to all to get jobs so that the poor do not suffer due to money pressure from the richer sections of the society and this will help to control the rising crime rate to some extent. Public awareness plays a vital role in improving all the troubles in society, increasing crime rate is no exception. If the public knows about the corrupt government officials they can get together and raise their voices to change them, this will bring unity among the people along with this, it will be a huge step in eliminating the crime ratio. Hence, awareness and unity can work together to control this major issue in the countries.

To conclude, as per the reasons along with the solutions mentioned above, it is clear that unemployment and government policies are contributing to an increase in the crime rate. Thus, the provided solutions can be applied to reduce this problem in the country. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Some countries achieve international sports by building specialised facilities to train top athletes, instead of providing sports facilities that everyone can use. Do you think this is positive or negative development?

Discuss both views and give your opinion. <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'It is a common fact that being a professional athlete requires consistency in practising. As an effort to support their athletes, some countries build certain sports centers which are specialized only for professional athletes. In this situation I strongly believe that providing these facilities brings more benefits compared to the negatives.

To begin with, there are several advantages of building facilities only for professional athletes to practice. Firstly, it gives more flexibility for the athletes to set their practice schedule since no other strangers will use the facilities. Subsequently, they can have more time to practice and improve their skills. In addition, the use of an exclusive building lets athletes focus more on their practice because their fans will have no access to the facilities.

Beside the positives, using an exclusive building also has some drawbacks. One disadvantage is that coaches will not be able to meet new sportsman in the field. For example, non-professional players will not use the facilities to practice while coaches will spend most of their time in the building. Unfortunately, the possibility for them to meet during practice is reduced. Another drawback is that the government will spend more money on the asset. The expenses are not only used when they build it but also the maintenance of the facilities.

In conclusion, despite the negatives such as giving less chance for new players and gaining more expense, building exclusively facilities for athletes is more important for the country. The importance is due to the development of the athletes' skills as their practice schedule and focus will not be distracted. <END_E>

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
<START_Q> Some people prefer to spend time on team sports, while others like to do single-player sports. In my opinion, as long as they do any sports which is valuable, therefore, people need to choose sports that are suitable for their needs. This essay will delve into both perspectives with my own opinion. <END_Q> 
 <START_E> 'Some people prefer to spend time on team sports, while others like to do single-player sports. In my opinion, as long as they do any sports which is valuable, therefore, people need to choose sports that are suitable for their needs. This essay will delve into both perspectives with my own opinion. 

Firstly, team sports encourage skills such as leadership and teamwork that are essential in this fast-developing society. This is because most corporate jobs require teamwork skills as they have many workers, such collaboration skills help to be more productive. Additionally, leadership skills can be developed by playing team sports as it requires at least one leader in the team, which is also an essential qualification for  bigger companies. Therefore, some organizations encourage their staff to play team sports. For instance, in Mongolia, bigger corporations organize basketball competitions among their staff annually. As a result, their worker can improve their soft skills while enjoying their free time. 

Secondly, individual sports maintain mental health as people need to spend time with themselves, and push their boundaries while they are training. This is because spending  quality time is almost rare in this fast-growing society, therefore, some people take chances  to release their stress after heavy workloads. For instance, the number of swimmers is  growing  these days because they can spend time with themselves as most people devote their time to work. 

To conclude, in my opinion, doing sport is essential, whether it is team or individual. People can choose  their own preferences, such as corporate workers prefer teamwork sports as it improves their leadership and collaboration skills. Conversely, some people like to do single-player sports as it encourages their mental well-being. <END_E>
